1. Casey and Ashleigh are preparing for a slumber party at their sorority house, ZBZ. Casey is using the opportunity to impress the new pledges and win their votes for the upcoming ZBZ presidential election.
2. Meanwhile, at the KT fraternity house, Calvin and Evan are left behind on house duty while the rest of their fraternity brothers are at a football game. Evan tricks Calvin into thinking he needs help repainting the kitchen, but really just wants to spend time with him.
3. At the KT house, Cappie is feeling down and uninterested in the party scene. He meets Destiny, a mysterious and intriguing girl who shows up unannounced.
4. Back at the ZBZ house, the slumber party is in full swing. Rebecca tells a ghost story about a former ZBZ member named Virginia who died in the house. Casey dismisses the story, but later finds out that Virginia did indeed die in the house.
5. The power goes out due to a storm, and the girls at ZBZ decide to have a séance to contact Virginia's spirit. They believe that Virginia is trying to tell them something, and they hope to find out what it is.
6. At the KT house, Calvin and Evan hear strange noises and think they have a rat. They attempt to catch it, but it turns out to be a escaped mental patient from a nearby institution.
7. Back at the ZBZ house, the séance reveals that Virginia's election for ZBZ president was rigged, and she actually won the election. Casey, who was responsible for counting the votes, had accidentally left out one of Virginia's votes, causing her to lose.
8. The girls at ZBZ decide to have a revote and elect Virginia as the new president. Casey feels guilty for her mistake but is relieved that the truth has been revealed.
9. At the KT house, Calvin and Evan are able to fend off the mental patient and wait for the police to arrive. Cappie returns to the house with Destiny, who turns out to be an old camp friend who had a crush on him. The night ends with everyone in their respective houses, reflecting on the strange and unexpected events of the night.

<summary>

1. The story begins with Ted wearing a green and brown shirt that he has had for six years but suddenly likes. This leads him to question his past decisions and consider reconnecting with an ex-girlfriend, Natalie.
2. Ted's friends remind him of his past relationships, including a porn star and a girl who hit a hitchhiker. They finally settle on Natalie, who Ted dated three years ago.
3. Ted calls Natalie, but she hangs up on him. He decides to visit her in person, only to find out that she is still angry about how he broke up with her - by leaving a message on her answering machine on her birthday.
4. Ted apologizes and explains that he has changed, and he and Natalie start dating again. However, Ted realizes that he is not feeling the same way about her as he did before, and he decides to break up with her.
5. Ted struggles to find the right words to break up with Natalie, and his friends suggest various clichéd lines. In the end, Ted tells her the truth - that she is not the one for him.
6. Natalie is hurt and throws spaghetti at Ted. They get into an argument, and Natalie reveals that she has been taking Krav Maga classes, a form of martial arts.
7. Natalie attacks Ted, who ends up with bruises all over his body. Ted's friends are concerned, but Ted takes the incident in stride, saying that sometimes things happen for a reason.
8. The story ends with Ted's son expressing disbelief that his father was beaten up by a girl. Ted explains that she knew Krav Maga, and the narrator adds that within a year, Natalie was married with three children.
9. The story concludes with the reminder that sometimes things happen for a reason, and not all stories have a happily ever after.

</summary>

1. Caroline is grieving the loss of her mother, Liz, who recently passed away. Her friends gather at the Salvatore Boarding House to support her, and Damon is struggling to write Liz's eulogy.
2. In a flashback, young Stefan and Damon are preparing for their mother's funeral in 1857. Damon helps Stefan tie his tie and reassures him that it's okay to cry, despite their father's expectations.
3. In the present day, Stefan asks Damon for advice on how to approach Caroline about their recent kiss, now that her mother has passed away. Damon suggests that if Caroline was the one, Stefan wouldn't have to ask for advice.
4. At Liz's funeral, Damon delivers the eulogy, sharing Liz's last words about her pride in Caroline. Caroline delivers a heartfelt performance of "Go in Peace" by the Wailin' Jennys.
5. Later, Tyler shows up drunk to the funeral, causing a scene and nearly getting into a fight with Matt. Matt, inspired by the police officers honoring Liz, decides to apply for an officer training program.
6. Meanwhile, Bonnie finds herself in a snowy prison world, realizing she is in the Salvatore Boarding House from 1903. She discovers a picture of Damon and Stefan, confirming her location.

1. Sheldon is upset because the wallet he ordered online has only seven slots for cards instead of the eight plus removable ID that was advertised, which would have made room for nine cards.
2. Raj's parents, who are in India, video chat with him and his friends using a laptop. They want Raj to get married and have children soon.
3. Raj's parents suggest a girl named Lalita Gupta, who is a dental student in the US. Raj is hesitant because he has trouble talking to women.
4. Howard calls Lalita and pretends to be Raj, asking her out on a date. Raj is unhappy with this and worries about what will happen when he meets Lalita in person.
5. Penny comes over to practice making drinks for her new bartending job. She makes a tequila sunrise for Leonard, a grasshopper for Raj, a diet coke for Sheldon, and a slippery nipple for Howard.
6. Raj gets drunk and talks about his dreams of being a particle astrophysicist. He decides to stand up to his parents and tell them he won't marry Lalita.
7. Raj and Lalita meet at a restaurant and Raj is surprised to find that she is not fat anymore. He is rude to her and says inappropriate things, but Lalita takes it in stride.
8. Sheldon recognizes Lalita as looking like a character from an Indian folk tale called The Monkey and the Princess. He becomes infatuated with her and Raj becomes jealous.
9. Lalita and Sheldon hit it off and Sheldon leaves the restaurant with her, much to Raj's dismay. Raj's parents are upset because they wanted Raj to marry Lalita and have children with her.

1. David is trying to gain custody of his grandson, Little A, who is currently in foster care. He is facing opposition from Jesse and Social Services, and is threatening to take matters into his own hands. Meanwhile, J.R. is in jail and Colby is worried about the consequences of her actions.

2. Kendall and Ryan are struggling with their feelings for each other in the aftermath of Greenlee and Zach's deaths. Kendall is torn between her love for Ryan and her loyalty to Zach, and is seeking advice from her mother, Erica. Ryan is also feeling guilty about his feelings for Kendall, and is trying to move on by focusing on his daughter, Emma.

1. In the aftermath of Greenlee's disappearance, various characters react and respond to the situation. Ryan is determined to keep searching for Greenlee, despite the storm and the sheriff's orders. Jesse informs Ryan that the search efforts are being scaled back and shifted to recovery mode, which causes Ryan to become angry and distraught.
2. Meanwhile, Kendall is in the hospital, dealing with the physical and emotional consequences of the car accident. She believes that the accident is her fault and that she is responsible for Greenlee's disappearance. Kendall and Zach argue about the events leading up to the accident, and Kendall accuses Zach of sleeping with Reese.
3. In other parts of the scene, Dr. Sinclair reveals to Annie that Greenlee is dead and that she knows Annie is responsible. Annie denies any involvement, but Dr. Sinclair tells her that Aidan is gone and she is on her own. Jake informs Zach that Kendall does not want to see him, but Zach insists on going to the hospital to be with his wife.

1. J.R. is considering his father's offer of 50 million dollars to reconcile with him, but Tad advises him to define his own goals and not let his father's manipulations affect him.
2. Babe confesses to Krystal that she kissed Richie Novak after finding out about his potential bone marrow transplant. Krystal suggests that Babe's actions might be a way to avoid dealing with her feelings for J.R.
3. Tad and J.R. discuss J.R.'s vision of a perfect world, which involves sailing a yacht with Babe by his side. Tad encourages him to keep the faith and work towards his dreams.
4. Kendall feels guilty about Hannah's actions and Zach's anger towards Josh. Hannah has disappeared, and Zach orders his men to take her down if they find her.
5. In a heart-to-heart conversation, Tad assures J.R. that he will become the man he wants to be, emphasizing that J.R. has his mother's heart and will make it through his struggles.
6. Babe, still confused about her feelings, invites J.R. to stay at her place for the night. Meanwhile, Annie and Ryan share a lighthearted moment, and Hannah and Sean share a kiss in the park.

1. Veronica and Keith discuss the manila folders they are using for their investigations, and Keith mentions that he has a case involving Mindy O'Dell, who believes her husband's suicide was actually a murder.
2. At Hearst College, Mac and her friends are missing a genetically altered capuchin monkey and twenty control-group rats that were stolen from their lab. They believe the animal rights group PHAT is responsible.
3. Veronica and Mac go to a PHAT meeting and learn about the group's letter-writing campaign. Veronica suspects that the group may be involved in the theft of the monkey and rats.
4. Weevil helps Keith investigate Dean O'Dell's suicide and reveals that there was a note left on the computer screen. Veronica realizes that this is similar to an example she used in a class assignment.
5. Veronica talks to Piz and asks him to book Ed Argent on his radio show to help with the case of the missing monkey. Piz is skeptical but agrees to help.
6. Veronica and Mac go to a PHAT meeting and are asked to participate in a photo shoot for the group's anti-fur campaign. They are surprised to learn that they will have to pose nearly naked for the calendar.
7. Veronica and Mac attend a party at Hearst College and run into Bronson, the president of PHAT. Mac is interested in him, but she is unsure if he feels the same way.

1. Tad and Jake discuss a dating website, with Tad teasing Jake about his research on the site. Jake is defensive, insisting he was just doing research for a patient.
2. Amanda reveals to J.R. that she gave back the money David paid her and couldn't go through with the job. J.R. suggests they make peace, but Amanda is skeptical.
3. Erica and Adam argue about Fusion's financial situation. Erica accuses Adam of intentionally bringing down Bella fragrance and threatens to have him arrested.
4. J.R. presents Amanda with a legal agreement for primary custody of the baby, but Amanda is unsure and wants to think about it.
5. Tad and Jake discuss getting a dog for Kathy, but Jake is hesitant. Kathy overhears and begs her father for a puppy.
6. Brot and Taylor enjoy a simple breakfast together, reflecting on their past and their love for each other.
7. Erica asks Adam to temporarily help run Fusion, but Adam is skeptical of her strategy. Amanda overhears and quits her job.
8. David and Krystal get married in a small ceremony at home. David surprises Krystal with a prenup, which she signs despite her reservations.

1. Simone tells Joni that she should find a new boyfriend and stop bugging her about Fusion. Joni reveals that her best friend stole her boyfriend.
2. Liza and Adam discuss JR's disappearance. Adam wants to call the police, but Liza asks him to give JR some space.
3. Erica confronts Chris and Jackson about Chris's doubts regarding their marriage. Erica admits to focusing too much on Fusion and neglecting Chris.
4. Jamie and Adam argue about JR's disappearance. Adam accuses Jamie of hiding JR due to jealousy and anger about JR's relationship with Laurie.
5. Laurie and Doug argue about Laurie's financial aid forms for college. Doug is against Laurie accepting money from Adam Chandler.
6. Tad and Lysistrata discuss their past encounters and Liza's marriage. Lysistrata encourages Tad to embrace his true self.
7. Mia confronts Alison about Jake leaving her for Alison. Mia wants to know why it happened and how the affair progressed.
8. Erica and Jack argue about Chris's intentions and Erica's feelings for Jack. Jack warns Erica that Chris is not the man she thinks he is.

<summary>

1. Erica Kane's daughter, Bianca, is revealed to have been kidnapped and held captive by Ricky Torres, who also killed Bianca's father, Zach Slater. Kendall, Bianca's sister, teams up with Griffin Castillo to stop Ricky and save Bianca.
2. Griffin and Kendall successfully stop Ricky, who is arrested by the police. However, Griffin is also arrested for outstanding warrants, resisting arrest, and assaulting an officer, despite his heroic actions.
3. Bianca and her friend Marissa are rescued and reunited with their loved ones. Kendall and Griffin express their gratitude to each other for their help and support during the ordeal.

</summary>

1. Jamie reveals to Reggie that he told Babe that J.R. gave her the drug that put her in the hospital. Jamie is worried about what J.R. might do to Babe if he finds out that Jamie ratted him out. Reggie tries to convince Jamie that J.R. is capable of anything, given that he drugged Babe in the first place. Jamie decides that he needs to talk to J.R. before things get out of hand.
2. Krystal agrees to help David be a real father to Babe, despite her reservations. Danielle is released from jail and thanks Tad for his help. She is still grounded, but Derek allows her to see Reggie on a limited basis. Jamie confronts J.R. about drugging Babe, but Babe overhears and accuses Jamie of lying.

1. Tad Martin, a character who was shot and believed to be dead, is revealed to be alive and has found his missing daughter, Kate, who was being raised by Julia Santos Keefer as Kathy. Adam Chandler, who had knowledge of Kate's whereabouts, is criticized for his actions.
2. Ryan Lavery is struggling with memories of his past and his feelings for his wife, Annie, and his ex-fiancée, Greenlee. Greenlee has also been dealing with the aftermath of a broken engagement and is trying to move on.
3. J.R. Chandler, Adam's son, is dealing with his own issues and is planning to take revenge on Richie, a man who wronged him in the past. Babe, J.R.'s ex-wife, is trying to stop him from doing something rash.

1. Erica confronts Ethan about her daughter's whereabouts, leading to an argument about Zach Slater's innocence.
2. Greenlee and Kendall argue about Ethan's true intentions, while Simone tries to mediate.
3. Jack confides in Reggie about his concerns with Lily and Zach Slater's case.
4. Jonathan confronts Braden about Ryan's whereabouts and the truth about the murder.
5. Greenlee, Kendall, and Simone argue about Ethan's love for Kendall and his honesty.
6. Erica and Ethan have a heated argument about his intentions with Kendall.
7. Reggie and Jack discuss the latest developments in the murder case and the danger it poses to Ryan and Greenlee.
8. Ethan makes a call to Arthur, indicating a plan against Erica Kane.

1. Ryan and Annie are discussing the possibility of ending their marriage. Ryan is unsure about what he wants, and Annie is growing tired of trying to figure it out. Ryan asks Annie to hold off on filing for divorce, wanting a little more time to figure things out.
2. Greenlee is seeking Zach's help in winning back Aidan after making a mistake and turning down his proposal. She is adamant that she loves Aidan and wants to spend her life with him, and Zach agrees to help her.
3. Erica is visiting Carmen, a prisoner she believes has been wrongly accused. Erica is determined to help Carmen, despite Jack's warnings that it may be a lost cause. Carmen is skeptical but grateful for Erica's help.
4. Jesse is telling stories about his late sister, Jenny, to Tad and Colby. He speaks about their strong bond and the impact Jenny had on his life. Tad and Colby are clearly moved by the story, and Jenny can be heard cooing in the background.

1. Jesse and Angie spend their first night as a married couple in a hotel room, but are interrupted by the sound of a nearby wedding reception and a small fire caused by a fallen candle. Despite these interruptions, they are happy to finally be able to express their love for each other openly.
2. Erica Kane and Carmen Morales, both missing, are seen at the apartment of Armando's mother, where they are taking a tape recorder as evidence. It is revealed that Erica has made a deal to have Carmen released from prison temporarily in order to film a reality show about the struggles of single mothers.
3. Greenlee Smythe and Ryan Lavery have a heart-to-heart conversation about Ryan's memory loss and Greenlee's relationship with Aidan. Greenlee decides to return home to Aidan, but not before helping Ryan come to terms with his past.
4. Kendall Hart and Aidan Devane discuss the events of the night, with Aidan expressing regret for almost revealing their secret to Annie Novak. Kendall reassures him and they both hope for the best for Erica and the missing Carmen.

<summary>

1. Taylor goes to the hospital to have her foot checked out, as suggested by her friend Dr. Franklin Hubbard. She meets Jake Martin, who is impressed by her determination and offers to examine her foot.
2. J.R. Chandler and Krystal Carey discuss the possibility of J.R. buying Fusion Cosmetics for Babe to run. Krystal expresses her concerns about Babe's feelings and J.R.'s intentions.
3. At Fusion, Babe introduces Randi Morgan to Kendall Slater and Greenlee Smythe. Babe hired Randi as an assistant, but Kendall and Greenlee think she would be perfect for the Fusion Eye Candy campaign.
4. Fletcher, a man from Randi's past, demands money from Frankie Hubbard, threatening to harm Randi if he doesn't pay up. Frankie tries to protect Randi and her job at Fusion.
5. Kendall finds a hidden key in Annie Lavery's picture frame and suspects that Annie is hiding something. Annie quits Fusion and takes the key with her.

</summary>

1. Annie is excitedly planning her wedding with Scott, suggesting various extravagant locations. Scott is receptive and agrees to make it happen as soon as possible.
2. J.R. is discussing business with an unnamed person, expressing confidence in a deal and his intention to add a bonus for the person's services.
3. Marissa is upset after failing the bar exam and confides in Caleb. He offers her support and encourages her to try again.
4. Ryan and Emma are having breakfast together. Emma is wishing for a new Cinderella dress, as the one Greenlee gave her was lost. Ryan is unsure how to help Emma find a replacement.
5. Greenlee is returning home after a trip to New York. David is awake and concerned about her well-being. Greenlee mentions running into Ryan during her trip, which David already knew about through Frankie. Greenlee downplays the encounter, stating that she has everything she needs in Pine Valley.
6. Madison brings Emma a new Cinderella dress, but Emma rejects it, stating that the embroidered message from Greenlee is what makes the dress special. Ryan calls Greenlee for help, and she agrees to re-embroider the message onto the new dress.

<summary>

1. A shooting occurs at Angie and Jesse's wedding, leaving several people injured, including Julia Keefer who was shot in the upper right quadrant. Tad, who is Jesse's uncle, is also shot and is in critical condition. Robert, the shooter, takes Angie hostage and hijacks a helicopter.
2. Greenlee finds out about Aidan and Kendall's one-time encounter and is devastated. She wants to remove her engagement ring and never see Aidan again. Kendall is worried about Greenlee and asks Ryan to find her.
3. Julia's condition worsens, and she decides against having surgery. She knows that it would only be temporary and that she will die anyway. She asks Krystal to call her sister in California and tell Kathy that she loves her before she passes away.
4. Frankie, who is one of the men who went after Robert, fights him for the gun and is able to subdue him. Robert is then arrested by the police. Tad's condition is critical, and he is taken to PVH by helicopter.
5. Greenlee and Zach spend time together, and Greenlee begins to forgive Zach for his role in her relationship with Aidan. Kendall and Ryan discuss Julia's condition and Annie's reaction to the news.

</summary>

1. Jamie and Amanda are at a lookout point, and Babe shows up, causing tension between the three of them. Jamie wants to talk to Babe privately, and Amanda is upset that Jamie still cares about Babe.
2. Tad is trying to get information from Dixie about Kevin Sturgess, who he believes is involved in criminal activities and is a threat to Julia Santos. Dixie denies knowing anything about Kevin's illegal activities and is offended that Tad doesn't trust her.
3. Julia is talking to Sam, who is living with the Martins while Maria and Maddie are in California. Julia tells Sam about her history with Edmund and Maria, and how they fell in love. Sam is still upset about his parents' divorce and Julia tries to comfort him.

1. Annie has been remembering more things and reveals that Tori, a girl who has been helping her remember, is present with them. However, Aidan cannot see Tori and believes that she is a figment of Annie's imagination, created due to her loneliness and need for a friend to help her remember.
2. Adam, who is supposed to be in the hospital, shows up at Erica's place, and they share a kiss. Erica is concerned about his safety and tells him that the police are looking for him. Adam wants to know what Erica has told the police and his family about his condition.
3. J.R., Colby, and Tad discuss the abandoned car found near Rivermont. They suspect that Adam was driving the car and wonder where he might be. J.R. receives a phone call from Adam, but it gets disconnected, leaving them without any information about his whereabouts.
4. Zach prays for Ian's health and asks Myrtle for help. He hopes that Ian, who has fought hard to see his first birthday, deserves a longer life than most people.
5. Reese visits the hospital to check on Ian and Kendall. Kendall confronts Reese, believing that she is pretending to be concerned about Ian to score points with Bianca. However, Reese insists that she cares for Ian and shares a close bond with him.
6. David is anxious before performing surgery on a child and takes a moment to feel his pulse, which helps him remember the power he is about to face. Krystal joins him in this ritual, and they both encourage each other before the operation.

1. Damon and Colby have a moment where Damon shows his support for Colby after she tells him about the party and the death that occurred there. Colby is feeling down and Damon wants to be there for her, offering her cappuccino and a chocolate croissant. Damon also shows Colby a screensaver and video he made for her as a surprise.
2. Asher and J.R. have a conversation about Asher's resume and the college he claimed to attend. Asher admits to hacking into the computer system and changing grades for college basketball players in order to keep their scholarships. Asher offers his skills to J.R. and suggests that he could be a valuable asset to Chandler Enterprises.
3. Greenlee and Ryan discuss his current situation and the fact that he is in jail. Greenlee expresses her support for Ryan and offers to help with his case. Ryan tells Greenlee that she is not the reason he is in jail and that he doesn't want her to wait for him. Greenlee insists that she will wait for as long as it takes and that she has strong feelings for him.
4. Greenlee goes to the hospital to make arrangements for David's body. She is informed that David was poisoned and not killed by blunt force as previously thought. Greenlee is shocked by this news and is unsure of what it means for Ryan's case.

1. Gwen and Will introduce their newborn daughter, Hallie, to Casey, who is recently released from jail. Casey feels guilty for not being there for Gwen and the baby when they needed him.
2. Katie takes care of Brad, who is recovering from a broken leg. Brad tries to convince Katie to wash him, but she refuses and they bicker playfully.
3. Parker's therapist, Dr. Seidman, suggests family therapy to help with his anger issues and fear of abandonment. Jack and Carly agree to participate in the therapy sessions.
4. Carly tells Jack that she is not going to lose Parker and that they will do anything to help him. They discuss Rosanna's condition, which has not changed.
5. Sam and Cowboy Jack discuss getting rid of Parker so that Carly can be with Sam.
6. Brad tries to convince Katie to tell him that she loves him, but she is hesitant.
7. Barbara tells Lisa that she has cancer and Lisa encourages her to tell her children.

1. Aaron and Alison are at a party, discussing their relationship when Aaron gets a call from Will, who reveals that Emily is the one tormenting Rosanna. Alison doesn't believe it and is worried about the impact on her family.
2. Emily is accused of setting up Will and is confronted by Rosanna and Paul. She denies it and suggests taking a polygraph test to prove her innocence.
3. Will explains to Alison that he had to tell her about Emily because he didn't want her to find out from the newspapers. Alison is in disbelief and worried about the consequences for her family.
4. Hal, Emily, and Rosanna discuss the upcoming polygraph test. Hal explains that while it won't necessarily prove Emily's innocence beyond a shadow of a doubt, it is very persuasive.
5. Paul talks to Emily and expresses his hope that he's wrong about her involvement in the situation. Emily maintains her innocence and Paul shows her a picture of her holding the doll from Fairwinds.
6. Emily becomes unsure about taking the polygraph test, but Hal is supportive and encourages her to go through with it. Meanwhile, Rosanna and Paul discuss the situation and express their hope for a resolution in the new year.

1. Casey and Maddie have a conversation about their Valentine's Day plans, with Maddie revealing she is going out with Nate. Jack calls Carly to tell her he won't be home for dinner as he is working an extra shift at the station. Holden and Lily are surprised with the news that she is pregnant with their fifth child.
2. Meg returns to Oakdale after receiving a cryptic message, believing it was from Paul. She is relieved to find him alive, but Paul insists he didn't call her. Dusty takes Jennifer out for a romantic Valentine's Day dinner and she expresses her hope that Paul is still alive.
3. Will and Gwen hide in an abandoned music venue, grateful for Maddie's help in misleading the police. Meg decides to stay in Oakdale to help Paul, who is still weak and coughing. Paul expresses his gratitude and warns Meg of the dangers of being involved with him.

1. J.R. and Babe visit Alfred, a banker, to get information about J.R.'s missing mother, Dixie. Alfred initially refuses, but Babe persuades him by appealing to his compassion for a missing mother.
2. Zach shows Tad a newspaper article with a picture of Dixie with Garret Williams and another man. Tad reveals that Dixie was at the yacht club on the same date as Mimi Reed's wedding, talking to the groom, Garret Williams.
3. Julia attempts to poison Garret with bleach, but it turns out to be just water. Garret reveals that he knew Julia would fail his test and that he has been testing her to see if she can be trusted.
4. Greenlee meets Erin, Ryan's sister, and tries to explain who Ryan was to her. She shows Erin pictures and items that belonged to Ryan to help Erin understand their relationship.
5. Erin asks Greenlee if Ryan was like their father, who was abusive. Greenlee assures Erin that Ryan was not like their father and that he was a kind and caring person.
6. Krystal pretends that Adam is having a stroke to manipulate him into giving her half of his estate. Adam realizes her plan and becomes angry, accusing her of trying to commit him to a hospital to get his money.
7. Tad and Zach suspect Garret Williams of being involved in Julia's disappearance. They find a parking voucher from the yacht club on the same date as Mimi's wedding and believe that Dixie and Julia may have met with Garret there.
8. Julia and Di plan to attack Garret when he returns to their hideout. They hope to overpower him and escape before he can harm them.

1. At a charity event in Pine Valley, various characters interact and reveal their thoughts and feelings. Frankie is uncomfortable with his newly discovered sister Natalia and her mother Rebecca joining the family, while Randi calls him out on his prejudices. Jake and Taylor share a dance and express their feelings for each other. J.R. and Amanda also share a moment, with J.R. expressing his admiration for Amanda's strength.

2. The event is also a fundraiser for those affected by recent tornadoes in Pine Valley. Erica and Bianca are co-sponsors and express their hopes for the future of the community. Zach makes a generous donation in Kendall's honor, and Erica offers a dance with the highest bidder. David outbids Adam and wins the dance, much to Adam's chagrin.

3. Meanwhile, Ryan is on edge as he waits for news on Annie, who has been missing. Jesse informs Greenlee that Annie is still out there and bound to show up. Ryan receives a call from Annie, who says she wants to meet. He suspects she may show up at the event and decides to wait for her there.

4. In the midst of the event, tensions rise as David confronts Ryan and Greenlee about their relationship with Annie. Colby also appears uncomfortable and distant, leading Taylor to suspect something is wrong.

5. The evening takes a dark turn when Annie shows up at the event, armed with a knife. She is disoriented and violent, attacking Greenlee and revealing that she has already hurt someone. Erica is found motionless in the ladies' room, having been stabbed by Annie.

1. Casey Hughes is getting married to Alison Stewart the next day, and he is recording messages for his wedding video.
2. Mick Dante, who claims to be the reincarnated James Stenbeck, has escaped from the hospital and is holding Alison captive.
3. Alison tries to convince Mick to turn himself in and get professional help, but he is afraid of being sent to prison.
4. Paul Ryan, Alison's brother-in-law, is also looking for Mick, as he believes he is responsible for hurting his family.
5. Emily Stewart, Alison's sister, is worried about her and tries to find her with Casey.
6. Barbara Ryan, Paul's mother, believes that Mick is James Stenbeck and that he has discovered a youth serum to reverse the aging process.
7. Henry Coleman, Barbara's friend, warns her about Mick and thinks she is being fooled by him.
8. Mick confesses his love to Alison and asks her to run away with him, but she refuses and tells him to turn himself in.
9. Paul finds Alison and tells her that he knows Mick is James Stenbeck and plans to kill him.
10. Alison manages to escape from Mick and reunites with Casey, while Paul sets out to find and kill Mick.

1. Bianca finds out that Babe wrote in her letter that Bess is Miranda, but Erica withholds the truth from her because she doesn't want to hurt her. Bianca confronts Erica about not telling her the truth and Erica finally reveals that Babe and J.R.'s baby, Bess, is not Miranda.
2. J.R. asks Tad for help in saving Jamie from Babe's influence and Adam's threats. Tad suspects that J.R. doesn't want Jamie back because he doesn't want Babe back, fearing she will take Bess away from him.
3. Jonathan tells Greenlee that Ryan is not dead, but she refuses to believe him and shoots at Ryan when he approaches her.
4. Ryan confronts Zach about giving him the watch that belonged to Alexander Cambias, Sr. and accuses him of trying to kill him out of jealousy and anger towards his father.
5. Maria talks to Anita about her feelings for Edmund and Zach. She admits that she loves both men and is struggling to choose between them.
6. Bianca and Erica discuss the situation with Bess and Babe. Bianca expresses her anger towards J.R. for lying to her about Babe and Erica consoles her, telling her that she doesn't want her to cling to false hope.
7. Tad talks to Joe about the situation with Jamie, Babe, and Bess. He expresses his frustration and guilt about lying to Bianca and J.R. and not knowing how to handle the situation.
8. Erica and Bianca discuss buying a building from Zach. Bianca tells Erica that she is done with Zach and Erica expresses her dislike for him, but says she is confident that she can beat him at his own game.
1. Barbara, Holden, Dusty, and Margo are searching for Lily and Rose,

1. Erin, who is taking care of her brother Jonathan, gets startled by Aidan while stretching in the park and threatens him when she thinks he's out to hurt Jonathan. Aidan and Erin then have a conversation where Aidan explains that he's not the only one interested in Jonathan and that he's keeping an open mind about him. Erin explains that she's devoted her life to taking care of Jonathan because she loves him and that he's all she has.
2. Erica is talking to Tad about Dr. Greg Madden and his connection to her family. She's convinced that he has a grudge against her and that's why he's causing problems for Kendall. Tad tries to convince her that it might be the other way around and that Greg Madden might have gone along with Kendall's plan because it's what she wanted.
3. Jack and Zach are arguing about Kendall and Greenlee's situation. Jack accuses Zach of only being involved with Kendall to get her name on his casino licenses and Zach accuses Jack of not taking care of Kendall.
4. Ryan is trying to stop Greenlee from leaving him and Kendall is trying to explain to Ryan why she did what she did. Ryan is upset that Kendall kept the secret from Greenlee and that she didn't involve Greenlee in the decision.
5. Jack and Erica are talking about the situation and Jack is trying to figure out how to move forward. Erica tells him that he should blame Greg Madden and not Kendall.
6. Kendall is trying to explain to Ryan why she did what she did and Ryan is having a hard time understanding why she would keep such a secret from Greenlee. Kendall is upset that Ryan left Greenlee and that he didn't take care of her when she needed him.

1. Casey, Emily, Barbara, Alison, and Paul are trying to get Paul to the hospital after he was shot. Mick, who is holding them hostage, wants to play a game of "truth or dare" and starts asking uncomfortable questions.
2. Margo is outside the church, coordinating the police response. She wants to make sure no police cars get too close to the church, as she believes it would agitate Dante. Tom comes to join her, and they discuss the situation.
3. Mick continues his game of "truth or dare," and Emily reveals that she and Casey were married but divorced because she was scared of getting pregnant and had her tubes tied. Mick then asks if Alison and Casey have ever slept together, which leads to an argument.
4. Margo receives a call from Mick, who tells her that no one is leaving until he wins the game. Emily tries to call Margo as well, telling her that Dante has taken Alison and Casey somewhere.
5. Casey and Alison are tied up together, and Casey is angry with Alison for sleeping with Mick. Alison tries to explain herself, but Casey is hurt and upset.
6. The text ends with multiple cliffhangers: Paul's condition is worsening, Casey has just found out about Alison's infidelity, and Margo is trying to coordinate a rescue operation.

1. Carly is dealing with a brain tumor diagnosis and is overwhelmed with emotions. Parker, her son, is determined to help her and has been researching experimental treatments. He finds a clinic in Berlin with a new kind of treatment, but it would cost hundreds of thousands of dollars and Carly doesn't have that kind of money. Parker offers to use his trust fund, but Carly is hesitant as it's for his future.

2. Noah's father, Colonel Mayer, has a change of heart and accepts his son for who he is. He wants to make amends with Luke and his family. Meanwhile, Craig is pleased that Rosanna didn't testify against him in court, which means he is a free man. However, Meg is disappointed as she had hoped that Rosanna's testimony would send him to prison. Craig suspects that Rosanna's sudden memory loss was orchestrated by someone and confronts Meg about it.

1. Brad, Katie, Henry, and Vienna are at the hospital trying to conceive a baby through artificial insemination. Henry, who is Vienna's boyfriend, is hesitant about the process and accidentally knocks over a tray during the procedure. Brad and Katie, who are a couple, are also trying to conceive and are having a hard time doing so in a hospital setting.
2. Luke is avoiding a meeting at his foundation and his grandmother, Lucinda, is disappointed in him. Lily, Luke's mother, tries to reach him to tell him about the meeting but he refuses to go. Lucinda is sick and unable to attend the meeting, leaving Lily to go alone. Brian, Luke's former employee, shows up at the meeting and Luke decides to attend after all.
3. Brian used to work for Luke but left the foundation after realizing he was attracted to men. He is uncomfortable with the foundation's focus on gay rights and Luke's political nature. Luke and Brian have a heated exchange with Grant Moran, the potential partner from Starglow Foundation, about the foundation's mission statement. Brian ultimately supports Luke and the foundation's mission, leading to a successful partnership.
4. After the meeting, Luke decides to become more involved in the foundation again. Lily offers to be the new administrator and Luke agrees. Brian is happy for them but suggests they find someone with more executive experience. Lucinda is happy to see Brian and they have a heart-to-heart conversation about their past and his future.

1. Rick and Stephanie have a conversation about Rick's relationship with Steffy. Stephanie is against their relationship and tries to convince Rick to end it, but he refuses. Stephanie threatens to tell Ridge, Steffy's father, about their relationship, but Rick doesn't believe she will.

2. Meanwhile, Jackie, Nick, and Bridget are discussing a new designer for their company. The designer is referred to as "Madame X," and Jackie is keeping her identity a secret. Bridget, who is the new designer, is worried about her family finding out that she is working for the competition. Jackie reassures her and tells her that she will have to get used to the press and being in the spotlight.

1. Liam is waiting for Steffy to meet him, but she is late and he becomes frustrated, eventually leaving on his father Bill's jet. Steffy arrives soon after and Bill informs her that Liam has left.
2. Wyatt and Steffy finalize their divorce and Wyatt expresses his love for Steffy, stating that she was never really his to begin with.
3. Quinn is acting strangely and Ivy is concerned about her. It is revealed that Quinn and Ridge shared a moment in San Francisco and have now come to an understanding, agreeing to respect each other and not reveal their secret.
4. Steffy arrives at Liam's and they are reunited, with Steffy informing Liam that her divorce from Wyatt is final.

1. Lily has a dream that Ethan has died, but Holden reassures her that it was just a nightmare.
2. Emma, Alison, and Aaron return home to find that Ethan has been trapped in a hole for several days.
3. Henry is tied to a chair and being held captive by Derek, who is following James Stenbeck's orders.
4. Bonnie and Vienna are also being held captive in a warehouse, but they manage to find food and eat together.
5. Meg is worried about Paul, who has gone missing, and she tries to call him but cannot reach him.
6. The rescue team is working to lift Ethan out of the hole, and Paul is down in the hole with him.
7. Henry finds Bonnie and Vienna in the warehouse and helps them escape.
8. James Stenbeck reveals to Meg that he has been controlling Paul and that Paul is in danger.
9. In a preview for next week's episode, Alison tells Aaron that she wants to make a baby, and Meg is in a dangerous situation with James Stenbeck.

1. Janet is looking for Liberty, who spent the night at Paul and Emily's place without informing her.
2. Paul and Emily suggest that Liberty moves in with them until she gives birth, which Janet strongly opposes.
3. Adam's hearing is taking place, and Maddie is a key witness. Casey is worried about how it will affect Alison and Maddie.
4. Jack asks Paul to back off from the baby situation, but Paul insists that Liberty wants them to adopt her baby.
5. Maddie decides not to testify against Adam due to Casey's influence, causing tension between her and Alison.
6. Adam leaves town to avoid jail time, and Casey is responsible for it. Jack and Janet discuss the possibility of raising Liberty's baby themselves.
7. All charges against Adam are dropped, and he is reunited with his family. Casey has a falling out with Alison due to his actions.
8. Paul and Emily take Liberty shopping, and she starts to feel at home with them. Janet and Jack make a plan to raise Liberty's baby themselves.

1. Jennifer, who is pregnant, is getting married to Mike next week. Her mother, Barbara, is excited about becoming a grandmother and offers to handle the wedding planning. However, Jennifer is unsure about having a full-blown wedding due to her work commitments and the need to focus on her health and the baby.

2. Holden confronts Lily about Keith, accusing him of being a deadbeat and having a gunman after him for money. Lily defends Keith, saying he is an old friend and the gunman is an airline pilot. Holden expresses his concern for their children's safety, but Lily tells him to leave.

3. Casey invites Will and Alison to a dance, but Alison tells Casey that she can't be friends with Will anymore. Alison believes that Will trashed her apartment and used the situation to move in on her. Casey defends Will and gets angry with Celia for spreading rumors without proof.

4. Jack offers to check Keith out for Holden, but Holden declines, saying he doesn't want to risk losing J.J. Jack tells Holden to check himself and make sure he's not still in love with Lily.

5. At a dance contest, Tom and Margo win the trophy. Holden and Lily cross paths, and Holden expresses his concern for their children's safety. Lily tells him to let her go and move on. Meanwhile, Keith is confronted by a gunman named Vin, who accuses him of going far for money and wonders what Lily would think if she knew.

1. Chris Hughes has returned to Oakdale and is working at Memorial Hospital, but his father, Bob Hughes, is not impressed with his son's work ethic. Chris wants to pursue a cutting-edge research project with biochemist Evan Walsh, but Bob is hesitant. Chris and his girlfriend, Emily Stewart, try to convince Bob to support the project.
2. Jack Snyder and Carly Tenney are getting married, much to the surprise of their families. Jack wants to keep the wedding small and simple, but Carly has other ideas. She wants to make the wedding special for her family and invites as many people as possible. Emma, Jack's aunt, helps Carly with the wedding preparations.
3. Meanwhile, Katie Peretti, Jack's ex-wife, is out of town. Brad Snyder, Jack's brother, is worried about how Katie will react when she finds out about the wedding. Kim Hughes, Bob's wife, is happy to have Chris back in Oakdale and tries to convince Bob to support his son's research project. Chris and Emily have their own relationship issues to deal with, as Emily's mother, Susan Stewart, does not approve of Chris.
1. Ridge wants to buy a corner store from a couple who has had it for 4

1. Katie and Brad are expecting a baby, and Henry and Vienna are their close friends. Kim, a TV producer, wants Katie, Brad, Henry, and Vienna to appear on a reality show about their journey to get pregnant.
2. Kim also wants Henry and Vienna to appear on the show, but they are hesitant because they recently experienced a miscarriage. Despite Henry's reluctance, Vienna decides to support Katie and Brad by participating in the show.
3. Meanwhile, Paul and Rosanna are on the run with Meg's baby, and they stop at a diner to feed the baby. They pretend to be broke and offer to work for food. The diner owner takes pity on them and lets them work in exchange for food.
4. At the hospital, Katie's blood pressure is high, and the doctor advises her to take bed rest to avoid complications. Brad and Vienna agree to take care of Katie and fulfill her responsibilities at the studio.
5. Vienna agrees to co-host the show with Brad, and they do a trial show to see if they have chemistry on camera. Henry is uncomfortable with the idea of Vienna working closely with Brad.
6. Paul and Rosanna spend the night at a motel, and Paul is still unsure about what to do next. Meanwhile, Dusty and Bonnie are searching for Paul and the baby, and they stop at the same motel for the night.
7. In the end, Paul gives Barbara one hour to contact him, or he will disappear with Meg's baby forever.

1. Bonnie left some items in Dusty's car, and they discuss the time Bonnie got sick in Dusty's car. Dusty reveals he found a piece of underwear in the glove compartment, making Bonnie laugh.
2. Damian and Meg talk about Meg's daughter Eliza's return home. Damian asks about some documents Meg doesn't want him to see, which are revealed to be revised custody agreements drawn up by Bonnie.
3. Dusty plans to apologize to Meg for his behavior regarding Paul, while Bonnie advises him to give Meg flowers. Bonnie and Dusty then discuss Derek and the underwear found in the car.
4. Paul and Rosanna discuss Rosanna's job search and her newfound appreciation for a simpler life. Paul struggles to understand why Rosanna doesn't want to pursue getting her money back from Craig.
5. Meg and Damian discuss Meg's decision to allow Paul visitation rights with Eliza. Damian supports Meg's decision, and they discuss potential reactions from Meg's family.
6. Dusty brings flowers and apologies to Meg, who accepts them but insists she must make decisions for Eliza's sake, not Dusty's hatred of Paul. Dusty agrees to let Meg call the shots.
7. Craig approaches Rosanna, asking for her help regarding Carly's struggles. Craig wants Rosanna to approve of him so Carly will accept his help. Rosanna refuses, stating she will not approve of Craig seeing Carly.
8. Carly and Rosanna discuss Carly's struggles and Parker's issues. Carly shares her hope that someone will give Craig a chance. Rosanna shares her thoughts on Paul's potential for change.
9. Paul accesses Craig's laptop and looks for information on Craig's dealings, finding what he needs.

1. Steffy and Rick are trying to get Steffy's annulment papers signed so that she can finalize her divorce from Liam, but Liam is hesitant because he doesn't want Steffy to get hurt again. Liam confronts Rick about his intentions with Steffy, and Rick admits that he has a history with her and that he finds her attractive.
2. Brooke and Ridge are getting ready to meet Katie and Bill for dinner, but Ridge is reluctant to go because he doesn't get along with Bill. Brooke convinces him to go, and they end up having a pleasant dinner with their spouses. They discuss their children, including Hope's recent press conference and her relationship with Liam.
3. Liam and Hope are alone together and express their frustration with the situation with Steffy and the waiting period for the divorce. They both want to be married and start their lives together, and Liam suggests that they just leave and start their lives now. Hope considers it, but ultimately decides to stay and wait for the divorce to be finalized.

1. Wyatt wants to discuss something with Sally, showing her an idea related to Spectra Fashions.
2. Bill has spoken to Wyatt about returning to Spencer Publications, and Wyatt wants to make it a condition that Spectra Fashions is resurrected.
3. Donna is concerned about Katie's feelings for Bill, questioning if she still has feelings for him after her marriage to Thorne ended.
4. Bill is focused on reuniting his family, starting with Wyatt and moving on to Will and Katie.
5. Wyatt is committed to Sally and wants to ensure that she is a part of any decision he makes about returning to Spencer Publications.
6. Justin asks Donna to meet him privately to discuss Bill and Katie's situation.
7. Bill is concerned about Will's emotional state after Thorne's departure and offers to help explain the situation to him.
8. Donna updates Justin on her conversation with Bill, who seems to be taking the news of Katie and Thorne's annulment better than expected.
9. Wyatt is determined to reclaim his position at Spencer Publications and believes that Sally can accomplish great things on her own.

<summary>

1. Nicole, Vivienne, and Maya discuss how Zende has arranged for hair and makeup for them and how romantic it is that they are getting married on Valentine's Day.
2. Zende's parents, Kristen and Tony, arrive at the venue and are greeted by Eric and Quinn.
3. Pam and Charlie discuss the wedding preparations and Darlita asks Sally if she can be her plus-one to the wedding.
4. Shirley brings out cakes she has baked and Sally gets the idea to crash the Forrester wedding with a wedding cake.
5. Vivienne gives Nicole a handkerchief that her grandmother gave to her on her wedding day.
6. Julius, Nicole's father, arrives and is pleased to see that Nicole is marrying a good man.
7. Kristen and Ridge check on Zende and Kristen asks if something is wrong because Zende seems anxious.
8. Sasha arrives and Zende reassures her that she is welcome because she is the sister of the bride.
9. Julius tells Zende to take care of Nicole and Zende promises to do so. Nicole and Steffy discuss the wedding and Steffy gives Nicole advice.
10. The wedding ceremony begins with Carter officiating. </summary>

<summary>
1. Liam is excited about becoming a father and looks forward to receiving advice from Bill, who has experience raising his son, Will. Bill advises Liam to pay attention to his wife and make sure she knows how much he loves her.
2. Brooke is upset about something and considers talking to Eric about it, but ultimately decides to talk to someone else first. Eric expresses his support and care for Brooke, emphasizing their history together.
3. Hope and Steffy have a civil conversation, with Hope expressing her anger and sadness but also her hope for the future. Steffy reassures Hope that their marriage is not just about the baby.
4. Hope stays behind while Thomas, Oliver, and Steffy go surfing. Steffy chooses to leave despite the traffic, wanting to be on her way home to Liam.
5. A song, "Born to be Wild" by Hinder, plays as the scene shifts to a fast-paced, upbeat tone.
</summary>

<summary>

1. Beth Logan, the mother of Donna, Katie, and Brooke, is dealing with memory problems that she believes may be early signs of dementia. Her daughters are trying to find ways to help her, such as recreating memorable family events to keep her memories fresh. However, Beth has made the decision to return to Paris, despite her family's objections.
2. Meanwhile, Donna's son Marcus is getting used to being part of the Forrester family. He has been keeping his identity a secret from them, but has now revealed it to Rick. Steffy, Rick's sister, is worried about how their father will react to Marcus, as he has not accepted Donna or her children.
3. In a separate conversation, Katie is talking to her mother about her fears of being a burden to her family due to her memory problems. Katie shares her own experiences of feeling isolated and angry after her heart transplant, but ultimately finding peace with the help of her family. She encourages her mother to choose to live and not push her family away.
</summary>

<summary>

1. Nick asks Storm to be his attorney to handle his custody case with Taylor regarding their son, Jack.
2. Nick is worried about Taylor's drinking problem and her desire to be alone with Jack, but he doesn't want to take away her parental rights completely.
3. Taylor has brought Jack to her home and is taking care of him, but Rick is still concerned about her ability to care for him due to her past behavior.
4. Phoebe is worried about her mother, Brooke, after her breakup with Nick and the arrival of Jack. Ridge assures her that Brooke will be okay.
5. Nick and Brooke reveal to Storm that Taylor's drinking problem is due to the fact that Brooke is Jack's biological mother, not Taylor.
6. Taylor asks Rick to check her house for any alcohol to prove to Nick that she is not drinking.
7. Felicia approaches Ridge to plan a family anniversary party for Eric and Stephanie to prevent Eric from leaving with Donna.
8. Storm agrees to arrange an emergency hearing for Nick's custody case against Taylor, who has been served papers to appear in court.
9. Taylor is devastated by the news of the custody case and blames Brooke for trying to take her baby away.
10. Rick comforts Taylor and assures her that he will not let anyone take her baby away.

</summary>

1. Brooke and Bill are visited by Donna, who is concerned about Katie's health and accuses them of being responsible for her heart failure.
2. Brooke and Bill explain that Katie took off her wedding ring and left after finding them at Brooke's house, where Bill had gone following a car accident.
3. Bill had been arguing with Katie and collided with Brooke's car on his way home. Brooke drove him to her house as it was closer, and Bill hid in her bedroom to avoid Katie seeing him drunk.
4. Katie had become suspicious of Brooke and Bill's relationship and went to Brooke's house in the morning, where she found them in bed together, further upsetting her.
5. Katie is now in the hospital due to myocarditis, an inflammation of the heart muscle, which may have been caused by missed antirejection medication.
6. Taylor, Katie's doctor, is concerned about Katie's condition and questions Brooke and Bill about the events leading up to her hospitalization.
7. Bill is uncooperative with Taylor, and she suspects that there is more to the story than what they are telling her. She vows to find out the truth.

1. Steffy and Liam are preparing to leave for their wedding in Australia, while Eric and Quinn are also getting ready for the trip. Meanwhile, R.J. stays behind to take care of things at home.
2. Thomas visits Sally to say goodbye before his trip to his sister's wedding, and he invites her to be his date, but she declines due to her financial situation.
3. The Forrester family, including Brooke and Ridge, arrive at the airport and board the plane to Sydney. Bill and Katie also join the group, and Brooke asks Katie to make sure her parents get married.
4. Shirley and Saul urge Sally to accept Thomas' invitation and attend the wedding, while Sally expresses her reservations about using the opportunity to poach Forrester designs.
5. Ivy and Thomas discuss their excitement about the trip, and Thomas reveals that he considered bringing a date but decided not to. Steffy and Liam express their gratitude for everyone joining them on their special day.
6. Ridge and Brooke reflect on their long journey to getting married, and Eric encourages them to think about their vows. Meanwhile, Sally decides to book a last-minute flight to Sydney.
7. As the plane takes off, Steffy and Liam share a moment together, while Brooke and Ridge express their excitement for their upcoming wedding. The scene ends with Nicole revealing Maya's true identity as Myron and Steffy confronting Quinn about her manipulations.

1. Donna and Thorne's wedding is interrupted when Thorne expresses doubts and ultimately decides he cannot go through with the marriage. It is revealed that Donna's true intention for marrying Thorne was to get back at his mother, Stephanie.
2. Katie, Donna's sister, tells Thorne about Donna's plan, leading Thorne to realize the truth. Donna tries to explain and deny, but Thorne ultimately ends the relationship.
3. Stephanie is pleased that the wedding did not take place, and Donna is left heartbroken and vowing to get revenge on Stephanie in the future.

1. Brooke and Nick are stuck on Nick's boat due to fog, and Brooke asks Nick to call her sister if she doesn't make it to Catalina for their dinner plans.
2. Macy and Deacon are discussing the possibility of getting married, despite Brooke's restraining order against Deacon.
3. Rick is concerned about Macy getting involved with Deacon, believing that Deacon is using Macy to get back at the Forresters.
4. Sally defends Deacon and Macy's relationship, stating that they are trying to move on with their lives and that Rick is being vindictive.
5. Nick and Brooke are enjoying their time on the boat, with Brooke expressing surprise at Nick's cooking and fishing skills.
6. Nick shares his desire to have five daughters in the future, and Brooke expresses her belief that he would be a good father.
7. Macy expresses hesitation about getting married to Deacon, citing their relatively short time together and her past mistakes in relationships.
8. Deacon reassures Macy and expresses his confidence in their relationship, and they eventually agree to get married.

<summary>

1. Steffy and Liam notice that Bill is quiet and reflective during a visit with their daughter Kelly. Liam expresses his desire to spend more time with his daughter Beth, who is currently living with Hope.
2. Thomas announces his plans to marry Zoe in the near future, causing Douglas to become upset. Hope is concerned about Douglas's emotional well-being, while Thomas is eager to move forward with the wedding.
3. Steffy expresses her concerns to Thomas about his rushed wedding plans and his true motivations for marrying Zoe. She suggests that Thomas may still have feelings for Hope and is trying to sabotage Hope and Liam's relationship.
4. Liam tries to comfort Hope, who is upset about Thomas's wedding plans and Douglas's emotional state. Liam suspects that Thomas is manipulating the situation in order to get a reaction from Hope and push her towards marrying him.
5. Steffy confronts Thomas about his true motivations for marrying Zoe and his treatment of Douglas. Thomas insists that he cares about Zoe and wants to move forward with the wedding, but Steffy remains skeptical.
6. Thomas shows Zoe two wedding gowns, one of which he intends to use as a showstopper for the Hope for the Future line. Zoe is excited about the prospect of getting married, but Hope remains concerned about Douglas and Thomas's true intentions.
7. Carter, the family lawyer, congratulates Zoe on her engagement and assures her that Douglas will come around in time. Zoe expresses her concerns about Thomas's desire to get married right away and the impact it may have on Douglas.
8. Liam encourages Hope to see through Thomas's manipulations and not let him get to her emotionally. Hope acknowledges that she has been watching Thomas's behavior carefully, but is still unsure of his true motivations.

</summary>

1. Felicia is upset with Nick for telling her mother about her supposed drug habit, and Ridge and Brooke discuss Thorne being removed from Forrester Creations.
2. Darla is worried about Thorne losing his job after accidentally giving Sally Spectra Forrester designs, but Stephanie and Eric are more concerned about Felicia's potential drug problem.
3. Ridge asks Felicia to talk to Thomas about a mystery girl he's been seeing, and Felicia agrees but is skeptical about the situation.
4. Thorne and Darla go to Eric and Stephanie's house for a meeting where Thorne will be removed from the company, and Darla expresses confidence that Thorne will keep his job.
5. Ridge and Brooke discuss Thorne's removal, and Ridge compares himself to Massimo. Brooke reassures Ridge of his importance to Forrester.
6. Thorne, Darla, Eric, and Stephanie have the meeting, and Eric announces that Thorne will not be the one leaving the company.
7. Ridge goes to the meeting, and Eric announces that Ridge will be the one leaving Forrester Creations.

1. Bridget is pregnant with Nick's child, and they are struggling with how to tell Brooke, Nick's current wife and Bridget's mother. Bridget is worried about the impact this will have on Nick's marriage, but Nick is hopeful that they can find an arrangement that suits everyone.
2. Shane, a homeless man who knows that Taylor killed Darla, is causing tension for Taylor and Stephanie. They are worried about what he might do with this information and are trying to find a way to neutralize the situation.
3. Brooke has recently renewed her wedding vows with Nick, but Jackie, Nick's mother, is disappointed that they are not having children. Brooke explains that she has already raised Rick and Bridget and is still responsible for Hope and R.J. She is confident that Nick understands and is not pushing for a child.

1. Donna returns from Paris to find that Eric has come out of his coma. However, she is not allowed to see him due to a misunderstanding where Eric saw Donna with her assistant, Owen, in a compromising position.
2. Donna tries to explain to Brooke that she and Owen were only comforting each other, but Eric misinterpreted the situation. Donna is now barred from seeing Eric by Stephanie and the rest of the family.
3. Meanwhile, Taylor struggles to put her baby Jack to sleep, and her tension is causing the baby to be restless. Rick suggests that Taylor's negative energy is affecting Jack and that she should accept help if needed.
4. Donna seeks Brooke's help in trying to see Eric, and Brooke suggests that Ridge might be able to help. Eric is recovering well, and Ridge wants to protect him from any potential harm.
5. Stephanie tells Donna that Eric does not want to see her and that she should stay away from him. Donna refuses to give up and vows to get her husband back.
6. Taylor is paranoid about losing custody of her baby and refuses to accept help from anyone, including Nick. She is afraid of history repeating itself and is determined to keep her baby with her at all costs.

<summary>

1. Thorne's family expresses their love and pride for him, acknowledging that they haven't always shown it.
2. Thorne is given the Spectra Couture collection as a gift and is encouraged to return to Forrester Creations.
3. Ridge has a restraining order against Amber and warns Thomas to stay away from her.
4. Thomas and Amber arrange a secret meeting, unaware that Stephanie has learned about it.
5. Caitlin informs Stephanie about Amber's new job at Insomnia, where Thomas frequently visits.
6. Stephanie suspects that Amber took the job to be near Thomas and plans to intervene.
7. Thorne expresses his feelings about his family's inability to offer him the presidency at Forrester Creations.
8. Ridge and Brooke share a heartfelt goodbye as Ridge prepares to leave town for work.
9. Thomas brings Amber food during her break, unaware that Stephanie is waiting for them.
10. Stephanie confronts Amber about her meeting with Thomas, accusing her of lying.

</summary>

1. Brooke has decided to step down as the spokesmodel for her clothing line, Brooke's bedroom, and wants her sister Donna to replace her. Donna is unsure about her ability to fill Brooke's shoes, but Brooke believes in her and promises to teach her.
2. Ridge is unhappy about Brooke's decision to quit modeling and is also upset that Donna will be taking over. He has stopped designing for the Brooke's bedroom line as he was only inspired by Brooke.
3. Donna and Brooke have a conversation about Brooke's decision to give up modeling. Donna expresses her disapproval and believes that Brooke is making a mistake. Brooke, however, is determined and introduces Donna as the new face of Brooke's bedroom.
4. Dante and Bridget discuss their failed attempts to have a baby. Bridget reveals that she is relieved that she is not pregnant, which upsets Dante. They have a disagreement, and Dante asks Bridget to leave him alone.
5. Ridge and Donna discuss the Brooke's bedroom line. Ridge reveals that he will not be designing for the line anymore. Donna tries to convince him to change his mind, and Ridge eventually agrees to design the line for Donna.
6. Felicia confronts Dante about Bridget not being pregnant. Dante is upset and tells Felicia that Bridget wants him to wait. Felicia consoles Dante and tells him that she is still in love with him and will be waiting for him if things don't work out with Bridget.

1. Flo, played by Katrina Bowden, donated her kidney to Katie, Brooke's sister, in secret. The Logan family is shocked and expresses their disapproval of Flo's actions, but Katie is grateful for the gift. Wyatt, Flo's ex-boyfriend, is engaged to Sally and is reassuring her that he is committed to their relationship and not thinking about Flo.

2. Donna, another Logan sister, suggests that they should thank Flo for her sacrifice, despite what she did to Hope. Brooke, however, is still angry with Flo and reminds her that she will never be a part of the Logan family. Katie, on the other hand, is grateful for Flo's sacrifice and feels that her father would be proud of her. The episode ends with Brooke warning Shauna, Flo's mother, to stay away from her, her sisters, and her husband.

1. Deacon visits Hope to apologize for missing her wedding and to discuss her recent separation from Liam. Hope explains that Liam found a note from Deacon and thought she had left him, leading him to turn to Steffy. Deacon expresses regret for his actions and acknowledges his role in the situation.
2. Bill and Katie discuss Liam's situation with Hope. Bill is pleased that Liam has moved on from Hope and is focusing on his work. Katie advises Liam to be cautious and considerate in his interactions with Hope to avoid causing unnecessary friction with his son.
3. Rick and Thomas discuss their recent photo shoot with Hope. Rick intends to use the photos to promote Hope for the Future, while Thomas is uncomfortable with the attention he is receiving from Hope. Caroline expresses her concerns to Rick, who dismisses them and focuses on his ambitions for Forrester Creations.
4. Deacon and Hope continue their conversation, with Deacon encouraging Hope to reconsider her feelings for Liam. Hope expresses her love for her father and asks him to stay in her life. Deacon reveals that he saw Hope's press conference and is concerned about Liam's intentions.
5. Bill reflects on Thomas and Hope's recent public appearance and expresses his pride in Liam for moving on from Hope. Liam expresses his doubts, but Bill encourages him to focus on his work and his role as a Spencer. The scene ends with Bill angrily confronting someone at his door.

1. Bill, Liam's father, is concerned about Liam's engagement to Hope. He thinks that Hope is not fully committed to the marriage and is using Liam only when it suits her.
2. Hope believes that Liam is out having a bachelor party, but in reality, he is at a sophisticated event with his father and other male friends.
3. Steffy, who has feelings for Liam, is also trying to end his engagement to Hope. She believes that Hope has broken too many promises and that Liam deserves better.
4. Hope admits to Brooke that she broke a promise to Liam about moving up the wedding date, but she is confident that she can explain her reasons to him and that he will understand.
5. Bill has asked Steffy to take Liam home and to do whatever she can to end the engagement. Steffy agrees, but she also makes it clear that she will always be there for Liam if he needs her.
6. Liam is aware that his father is trying to end his engagement to Hope, but he is determined to marry her. He acknowledges that Hope has hurt him, but he loves her and is willing to work through their issues.
7. Steffy offers to spend the night with Liam if he needs someone to talk to, but he declines, saying that he needs to talk to Hope in person.

<summary>

1. Ridge helped his son, Will, get a chance for a better life by using his connection with a judge.
2. Bill thanks Ridge for helping him see Will more often, but Ridge denies bribing the judge.
3. Pam and Charlie announce their engagement, surprising Eric and Quinn.
4. Thorne is upset about Bill's advances towards Brooke and Ridge's recent marriage.
5. Ridge tells Brooke that she can't be near Bill ever again, and she agrees.
6. Brooke explains to Ridge that Bill came to thank her for helping him with Will's custody.
7. Pam wants to get married in Eric's living room, under Stephanie's portrait.
8. Thorne is worried about Bill's intentions towards Brooke, and Ridge promises to protect his family.
9. Bill expresses his gratitude to Brooke for helping him with Will, and Ridge becomes jealous.
10. Brooke reassures Ridge that she only loves him and asks him to stop overreacting.

</summary>

<summary>

1. Quinn Forrester is concerned about her son Wyatt's relationship with Katie Logan, and when she expresses her concerns to her husband Eric, he gets mad and walks out. Quinn also has a physical altercation with Katie.
2. Sheila Carter, a former employee of Forrester Creations, is now working as a waitress at a restaurant near the company. Pam, another employee of Forrester Creations, is surprised and suspicious of Sheila's presence.
3. Quinn and Mateo, a massage therapist, are discussing Quinn's back pain and her argument with Katie. Quinn reveals that she found Wyatt and Katie in bed together, which led to the altercation.
