8. Marlena's loved ones gather to say their final goodbyes. Sami struggles to let go of her mother, and Celeste hears Marlena's voice calling out to her.
9. Jan holds Shawn captive and plans to punish him for lying. Nicole tries to seduce Brady, and Sami hears Marlena's voice calling out to her.

1. JJ has been shot and is in critical condition after slipping into a coma due to rapid blood loss. Marlena, a psychiatrist, performs a procedure to relieve pressure on his collapsed lung, and he eventually regains consciousness. Orpheus, JJ's shooter, is captured, but not before causing chaos and injuring more people.

2. Adrienne and Justin, two other characters, discuss their complicated history while waiting for news about JJ. Adrienne is set to marry Lucas, but Justin expresses concern about the urgency of their plans. Their conversation reveals lingering feelings and unresolved issues between them, despite their past separation.

1. Abe and Theo will attend Samantha's wedding, and Abe agrees to perform the ceremony as a surprise for Samantha, who is running out of family to invite.
2. Paige's mother, Eve, arrives in Salem to visit Paige and meets JJ. Eve is a singer who loves various music genres and has taken Paige to see many Broadway shows.
3. Jordan is worried about Ben's safety, as someone has found all her aliases. Ben believes they are safe and wants to make a stand in Salem, where Jordan's loved one, Rafe, lives.
4. Rafe feels responsible for Gabi's actions and is punishing himself. Kate encourages him to reconsider his relationship with Jordan, as Gabi was happy that they met.
5. Abigail is overwhelmed with planning Sami's wedding and feels she cannot wait for it to be over. She is also concerned about EJ and Sami's relationship, but Tad believes they could be good together.
6. Eve and Paige visit Jennifer, and Eve is excited to meet JJ, whom Paige praises highly. JJ is nervous about meeting Eve, as he has a criminal record, but Jennifer is confident that Eve will see his good heart.
7. Kate asks Jordan to help Rafe, as he is blaming himself for Gabi's actions and needs support. Kate believes Jordan can step up, as she made Rafe fall in love with her.
8. Paige introduces JJ to her mother, Eve, who is surprised to learn that JJ is from the Deveraux family.
1. Luke

1. Gabi, Eli, and Rafe have a conversation in the police station. Rafe makes a comment about Eli and Gabi's relationship, which leads to tension between the two men. Eli later reveals that he is a former FBI agent and that he saved Gabi's sister's life.
2. Kate offers to buy Gabi's company, gabi chic, and fold it into Countess W. Gabi is hesitant because she has worked hard on her company and is unsure about the rumors surrounding Dimera. She also doesn't want to work with Chad again.
3. Eric and Jennifer have a conversation about the Horton Center and the situation with Nicola. Eric mentions that he is grateful for Jennifer's support and that she has always had his back.
4. Brady tells Victor that he has information on who killed Deimos. He reveals that Eve is the one who killed his uncle.
5. Kate calls Abigail and informs her that a member of the press has been harassing her. The reporter in question is Abigail's mother.

1. Hope is worried about Ben Weston being around Ciara and wants Marlena to help her convince Ciara that Ben is a danger to her. Marlena has been working with Ben in therapy and believes that he can lead a productive life with medication and psychotherapy.
2. Chad is struggling with the news that Abigail is pregnant with Stefan's baby and is unsure if he can be accepting of the situation. He confides in Gabi, who encourages him to talk about his feelings and offers her support.
3. Lani receives a package from the state regarding her stillborn son, David, and is emotional about the fact that he will never have a chance to leave his mark on the world. Eli comforts her and reminds her that David left a mark on them.
4. JJ confronts Chad and Gabi about their relationship and expresses his concern for Gabi getting hurt again. Gabi confides in JJ that she is worried about not being able to have any more children due to her condition.
5. JJ encourages Gabi to stay positive and believe that things will get better if she works on herself and appreciates the people in her life.
6. Marlena tries to help Chad come to terms with the situation and encourages him to open his heart to the baby, as Abigail has done.
7. Abigail tells Stefan to stay away from her and Chad, but Stefan insists that he will always be there for her if Chad can't be.

<summary>
1. Kate visits Victor to discuss Stefan hiring Nicole for a project at Dimera. Victor is concerned about potential distractions from his current issues, including Maggie's alcoholism.
2. Hope is looking for Ted Laurent, who left her a message about having good news about Nicole. She suspects he might be in Nicole's room after hearing a phone ringing there.
3. Xander has been ordered to kill Ted, but Ted offers him a valuable necklace as a bribe and proposes a deal for a free pass with the law if he spares his life.
4. Kate suspects that Nicole and Xander might be working together using both Dimera and Titan for secret ends. Victor decides to abstain from alcohol to support Maggie.
5. Nicole tells Sami that she has given her blessing for Sarah and Eric to be together. Sami insults Nicole, causing a physical altercation.
6. Eric, Rex, and Sarah discuss helping Eric win back Nicole. Rex and Sarah decide to get married immediately, with Eric officiating the ceremony.
7. Xander spares Ted's life and takes the necklace, intending to give it to Sarah to prove his dedication to becoming a better man.
8. Brady advises Nicole not to work for Stefan and offers her a job at Titan. Nicole expresses her desire to start over with Brady, but he declines, not wanting to hurt Eric.
9. Hope suspects that Nicole is hiding something and is determined to find out what it is. Kate breaks into Nicole's room to look for evidence of her secret.
</summary>

1. At John and Marlena's wedding, Sami interrupts the ceremony, causing a commotion. She is adamant that Marlena cannot marry John, but she is unable to clearly explain why.
2. Sami eventually reveals that she believes Marlena will die if she marries John, due to a plan orchestrated by a mysterious "she." The crowd is confused and concerned, and Sami becomes increasingly agitated.
3. Meanwhile, Will has stepped outside the wedding due to feeling dehydrated. He is joined by Sonny, who notices that Will seems upset. Will eventually admits that he remembered their wedding, which triggered a flood of memories about their relationship.
4. Will is overwhelmed by these memories and is scared to talk about them further. Sonny is patient and understanding, and he encourages Will to open up and share what he remembered.
5. Back at the wedding, the crowd is still trying to make sense of Sami's behavior. It is revealed that the "she" Sami kept mentioning is Susan Banks, who has been invited to the wedding. Susan and Sami get into a heated argument, and Susan accuses Sami of being out of her mind.
6. Amidst the chaos, a gun is revealed, and it is unclear who it belongs to or what their intentions are. The crowd is shocked and scared, and they try to figure out what is happening.
7. Eventually, it is revealed that the gun belongs to Kristen DiMera, who has been disguised as Susan. She has returned to Salem with a grudge against Marlena and John, and she is determined to cause chaos and destruction.

<summary>

1. Claire and Ciara are discussing their activities; Claire was taking specimens to the lab, while Ciara was reading to a senior citizen. Ciara mentions that the senior wanted her to read "Fifty Shades of Grey," which Claire finds disturbing.
2. Abe and Valerie are planning to have dinner together; Theo overhears Valerie admitting to Abe that she lied about a lecture to stay in Salem and confronts them. Valerie explains that she wanted to make sure Abe was safe before leaving.
3. Sonny and Paul are discussing Paul's investigation into Eduardo Hernandez's shipping business; they find out that the shipment contains counterfeit designer handbags. Sonny is relieved that it's not something illegal.
4. Abigail is considering reuniting with Chad and Thomas, but Andre advises her to think about what's best for Thomas. Theo is suspicious of Valerie and wants to investigate her, but Ciara advises against it.

</summary>

1. Will is waiting for news about his grandmother who is in surgery after being shot. Sonny offers to take over reading duties to ari so Will can stay and wait for news.
2. Vivian calls the hospital to ask about her mother's condition and is frustrated to learn she is still in surgery. She contemplates taking matters into her own hands.
3. Jennifer and Jack discuss the destruction of Rolf's lab and suspect Eve may be responsible. Jack regrets ever getting involved with Eve.
4. Eve visits Vivian to discuss taking over Dimera Enterprises with Stefan during the crisis of Kate's shooting. Vivian is skeptical of Eve's qualifications.
5. Sarah wants to tell Eric something but is interrupted by Sonny. Sonny suspects Vivian shot Kate and wants her to pay for what she's done.
6. Xander tells Nicole he is getting a divorce and is seeing someone new, sarah. Nicole is skeptical and warns Xander of the consequences of his actions.
7. Eve tells Vivian about her past with Jack and how she plans to get revenge. Vivian is uninterested and leaves.
8. Kristen tries to seduce Brady but he resists, reminding her of all the horrible things she's done. Brady ultimately gives in and kisses Kristen.
9. Eric and Nicole reunite and express their happiness to finally be together. Sarah tells Eric she has no regrets and is happy for him and Nicole.

1. Rafe reveals to Sami that there's a possibility he may be reinstated in the FBI, which would give him direct access to files that could help find Sydney. Sami is excited and hopeful for Rafe.
2. Melanie tells Stephanie about her plans to elope with Philip in Las Vegas. Stephanie seems happy for her but also concerned, mentioning that Melanie might not be sure about getting married so quickly.
3. Victor and Vivian are discussing their plans for revenge against Carly when Daniel approaches them, warning Victor to leave Carly alone. Victor then tries to convince Daniel that Carly is a threat to his relationship with Chloe.
4. Nathan confronts Philip, trying to stop him from marrying Melanie, claiming that she is only doing it to punish him and that she doesn't truly love Philip. Philip dismisses Nathan's concerns and a physical altercation ensues.

1. JJ confesses to Jennifer that Paige knows about his undercover work for the DEA. Eve overhears JJ's conversation and later informs Kyle about JJ's double life. Kyle, who is dating Paige, doesn't believe Eve at first but eventually confronts JJ. JJ admits the truth and Kyle promotes him for his role in their drug operation.
2. Will and Paul discuss Will's marriage problems. Will blames Paul for driving Sonny away, while Paul takes responsibility for his actions. John and Paul have a heart-to-heart conversation about Paul's past mistakes and their strained relationship.
3. Chad and Serena share a drink and flirt with each other. Serena, who is a journalist, observes that Chad seems sad. Chad admits that he might be missing Serena. Later, Ben and Abigail celebrate their anniversary, and Abigail reveals that she is pregnant with Chad's child.
4. Caroline's friends convince her to join the bicentennial celebration committee. They plan to have the celebration in Victor's Victorian house and invite everyone to wear period costumes. Caroline agrees to participate, and everyone is excited.
5. Hope and Aiden discuss the time capsule project. Aiden takes credit for the idea, and Hope includes Chase in the project. Aiden thanks Hope for making him feel welcome in her life and surprises her with a contribution to the bicentennial celebration.
6. Adrienne and Lucas go on a date and enjoy themselves despite Adrienne's recent divorce. Lucas suggests that Adrienne might need more time to get used to being single before dating again. Adrienne confesses that she wants to spend more time with Lucas and experience new things together.

1. Sheila, a worker for Abe, the mayor of Salem, is forgiven for not coming to work due to food poisoning. She promises to give Abe a heads up if she gets sick in the future. Abe has doubts about Valerie's new job offer in Washington D.C., but Valerie wants him to consider a long-distance relationship. Abe is unwilling to do so.

2. Will and Paul have broken up, and Will has moved out. Paul is leaving Salem to participate in an experimental program in California that could help him walk again. John, Paul's father, supports his decision but is sad about his departure. Brady helps talk Paul out of leaving and encourages him to stay in Salem.

3. Tripp, a friend of Ciara, has framed Ben for starting a fire that almost killed Ciara. He did this to protect Ciara and get rid of the competition. Ciara and Tripp have slept together, but Ciara now feels that Tripp manipulated her into doing so. Tripp is defensive and denies this, but Ciara breaks up with him.

4. Valerie is disappointed in Abe's attitude towards her job offer and his unwillingness to try a long-distance relationship. She accuses him of being selfish and sexist. Will is trying to find Sonny, who has left Salem after learning that Will is in love with Paul.

5. Ben has discovered that Tripp framed him and tells Ciara about it. Ciara confronts Tripp, and they break up. Ben offers to help Ciara by turning Tripp in to the police, but Ciara is unsure about what to do.

1. Sonny, a mob boss, has just discovered that Detective Dominic Pirelli, who he was about to kill, is actually his son. Olivia, Dominic's mother, had kept this secret to protect her son from Sonny's dangerous lifestyle. Sonny rushes Dominic to the hospital, where they encounter Steve, a trauma surgeon, and Lisa, an orthopedist. Sonny requests his own surgeons, Robin and Patrick, to operate on his son.

2. Meanwhile, at Carly's house, a christening party is in full swing for Carly and Jax's daughter, Josslyn. However, Sonny and Dominic are absent, causing Lulu to worry about her fiancé. Molly, Carly's daughter, tries to convince Jason and Sam to get married, but they both insist they are not ready. Later, Sonny calls Robin and Patrick, asking them to help save his son's life. Robin is shocked to learn that Dominic is Sonny's son, as she had previously suspected, but Patrick had kept it a secret.

1. Todd Manning, a dangerous fugitive, is being held at the hospital by John McBain, a detective from Llanview. Todd's daughter, Starr, is grieving the loss of her boyfriend and daughter who were killed in a car accident caused by Sonny Corinthos, a mobster and the father of Starr's best friend, Michael. Starr confronts Sonny at the hospital and blames him for the deaths, but Sonny maintains his innocence.
2. Meanwhile, Maxie, a friend of Robin Scorpio-Drake (Starr's cousin), is dealing with guilt and grief after Robin's tragic death in a lab explosion. Maxie was with Robin before the explosion, and she feels responsible. She refuses to seek professional help but opens up to Ewen, a psychiatrist, about her feelings.
3. In other parts of the hospital, Steve and Olivia discuss a blackmail situation involving Johnny Zacchara. Johnny wants Steve to run an operation out of the hospital, and Steve is trying to stall him. Olivia offers to talk to Johnny and stand up for Steve, who admits his feelings for her.

1. In this scene, Claudia Zacchara approaches Jason Morgan to discuss a potential deal between their families. She mentions that she doesn't know who took Sonny's son or who shot Kate Howard, and Jason expresses disbelief due to her ability to lie. Claudia then asks Jason about his childhood dreams, and he reveals that he wanted to be a doctor. Claudia proposes a truce between their families, and Jason agrees to pass it along to Sonny.

2. In this scene, Maxie and Spinelli are discussing a clue that they found in Cooper's belongings - the letters "T.M.K." and the numbers "d-r-n-1-7." Maxie wonders if it could be a clue left behind by Cooper in case something happened to him. Spinelli agrees to look into it.

3. In this scene, Nikolas Cassadine is seen talking to Emily, who appears to be a hallucination or a ghost. Nikolas expresses guilt and fear, and Emily encourages him to remember what happened to her. Nikolas then has a confrontation with Diego Alcazar, accusing him of murdering Emily. Diego responds with a sinister tone, implying that he has something planned.

<summary>

1. Michael is angry that Brandon, who attempted to rape Abby, is out on bail.
2. Luke feels responsible for Jake's death and is blamed by Lucky, Jason, and his wife.
3. Sonny consoles Luke and tells him that Jake's death was an accident and he should not blame himself.
4. Lisa is still working at the hospital despite Robin's attempts to get her fired.
5. Patrick successfully performs a surgery and Robin is proud of him.
6. Theo, Brenda's father, is looking for her son, whom he wants to keep for himself.
7. Carly and Brenda argue over Sonny and Carly threatens to keep her kids away from Brenda.
8. Michael is upset with Dante for not warning Abby about Brandon being out on bail.
9. Luke and Suzanne, Theo's wife, have reunited and are planning to raise Brenda's son together without her knowledge.
10. Elizabeth blames herself for Jake's death and Luke tries to console her.

1. Nikolas ends his relationship with Rebecca because he cannot stop seeing Emily in her. Rebecca is hurt and angry, feeling that Nikolas made promises to her that he did not keep. Carly and Jax have a conversation about Michael's need for independence and trust from his mother. Patrick and Robin discuss the mayor's wife's attempts to settle the malpractice suit out of court.

2. Elizabeth suspects that Rebecca is cheating on Nikolas with Ethan and asks Lucky to investigate. Monica talks to Nikolas about his relationship with Rebecca and encourages him not to use Emily's memory as an excuse to shut himself off from the world. Claudia asks Johnny to help her deal with Jason, who is determined to prove that Claudia was responsible for Michael's shooting. Olivia asks Carly for help in dealing with Sonny's disapproval of her relationship with Johnny.

1. Georgie is in critical condition after a fall, and Maxie is also in the hospital due to B.J.'s heart failing. Sonny, Jason, and Ric are involved in a situation where Ric killed Evan, Maxie's ex-husband, in self-defense. Sonny and Jason leave the scene before the cops arrive, and Ric asks them to leave to clean up his mess and prevent John Durant from framing Sonny for murder.

2. Emily and Nikolas are having issues in their relationship due to Emily's rape. Emily feels frustrated and helpless, using Michael as a reason to hide from herself. Nikolas gives Emily space to heal, but Emily realizes she needs to face her fears and make love with Nikolas to move forward in their relationship.

1. Lucky catches Johnny wearing a Clinton mask and trying to break into Bernie Abrams' office. Johnny denies any involvement and Lucky can't file a report due to lack of evidence.
2. Jason asks Spinelli to track down Franco using a picture found in Josslyn's christening album. Franco wants Jason to know he's being watched.
3. Sonny has a meeting with Dante and federal prosecutor Claire Walsh. Claire plans to send Sonny to prison with Dante's help.
4. Carly worries about Franco's intentions and Jason reassures her that Josslyn is safe. They decide to focus on getting Sonny acquitted.
5. Lucky and Johnny discuss Max's break-in at Bernie's office. Lucky warns Johnny that Sonny is his enemy.
6. Diane's office is being renovated and Alexis is unhappy about sharing a small space with her.
7. Sonny and Dante argue about Sonny's upcoming trial. Dante plans to dismantle Sonny's organization once he's in prison.
8. Nikolas visits Alexis to discuss Elizabeth's reaction to setting up a trust for her baby. Alexis brings up the possibility of the baby being Lucky's.
9. Jason asks Lucky to stall his retaliation against Johnny for the sake of Lucky's family.
10. Luke asks Sonny to keep Ethan out of the mob war and Sonny agrees. Luke mentions that Dante and Lulu are together and Sonny is happy for them.

1. Sonny reveals to his ex-wife, Alexis Davis, that their sister, Olivia Jerome, is alive and responsible for the death of their brother, Duke Lavery. Olivia forces Julian to hold a gun to Alexis and shoot her, but Julian turns the gun on Olivia instead, and she is shot.
2. Carly is determined to find Olivia and make her pay for killing Morgan. She visits Ava Jerome, who reveals that Olivia had visited her earlier that day. Carly wants to find Olivia before the police do so she can seek her own revenge.
3. Jason Morgan and Curtis Ashford successfully disarm the bomb on the hospital roof, saving many lives. Sonny visits Jason, Sam, and their newborn daughter, Emily Scout, in the hospital.
4. Finn is going through withdrawal from Zen-Zen, a drug he had been taking to cope with the loss of his girlfriend, Hayden Barnes. Elizabeth Webber discovers him in the hospital and insists that he take a leave of absence until he is clean.
5. Jordan Ashford is recovering from being knocked unconscious during the bomb scare. Curtis insists that she see a doctor before returning to work, fearing that she may have a concussion.
6. Jake Webber, Jason's son, has a cryptic message for Elizabeth, "Never forget, Jake. Never tell." The meaning of the message is unclear.

<summary>

1. Alexis thinks Sam should reconsider having a baby with Jason due to the dangerous nature of his work and the recent loss of Jason's son, Jake.
2. Jax hires Alexis to help him get full emergency custody of Josslyn, but Shawn quits his job as Josslyn's bodyguard in response.
3. Lisa locks Robin in a basement and plans to kill her, blaming Patrick for their failed relationship and his supposed infidelity.
4. Brenda feels unsure about her role as Alec's mother and is uncomfortable with the new nanny hired by Jax.
5. Sonny and Brenda discuss the challenges of their marriage, including Sonny's past actions and the difficulties of merging their lives together.
6. Michael confronts Kristina about her drug use and she admits to taking hydrocodone, given to her by a doctor without a prescription.
7. Carly tries to convince Shawn to stay in Port Charles and continue protecting Josslyn, despite Jax's attempts to discredit him.
8. Michael decides to attend his high school graduation to make his parents and Kristina proud, despite his reservations.
9. Sonny discusses his marital problems with Jason and updates him on the situation with Brenda and Alec.
10. Lisa plans to frame Patrick for Robin's murder and leave evidence that will ensure he receives a life sentence.

</summary>

1. Sonny Corinthos is getting married to Carly, and there are several subplots involving various characters and their relationships.
2. Morgan, Sonny's son, is struggling with his recent breakup with Kiki and his fear of being bipolar like his father. Michael, Sonny's other son, is also having issues with his father due to his role in AJ's death.
3. Emma, Patrick and Sam's daughter, is starting a new school year and is having some separation anxiety from her grandmother, Anna, who has recently returned from a trip.
4. Sam is working on a case for Michael to help him get ELQ back, and she enlists Anna's help in getting information from Kyle Sloane about Nikolas' involvement in the mayoral election.

1. Elizabeth is in a physical altercation with Hayden, and Naomi, Hayden's estranged mother, unexpectedly arrives at the scene. Naomi reveals that she knows about Hayden's husband's death and offers to help Hayden with her legal problems.
2. Franco calls Elizabeth to check up on her, and they discuss her current problems, including Nikolas' disappearance and Hayden's behavior.
3. Lucas regains consciousness and begins to remember the events leading up to his shooting. He recounts seeing someone in a white lab coat over his mother, but he can't provide any specific details about their appearance.
4. Nathan wants to confess something important to Maxie, but she believes he wants to confess about cheating or getting someone pregnant. Nathan reassures her that he loves her and hasn't done anything of the sort.
5. Nathan finally reveals that he shot Claudette's lover years ago during a drunken, jealous rage. Maxie is shocked and struggles to process this new information.
6. Jordan investigates Lucas' shooting and questions various doctors, including Finn, about their whereabouts during the Nurses' Ball. Dr. Obrecht suggests that Jordan focus on doctors with unsavory histories.
7. Naomi and Hayden discuss their strained relationship, and Naomi offers to help Hayden deal with the government after her father's fraud scandal. Hayden reveals that she doesn't have her father's diamond necklace, as Nikolas had already sold one of the diamonds.
8. Elizabeth and Franco discuss Hayden and Nikolas' disappearance. Franco offers to help Elizabeth get revenge on Hayden, but Elizabeth declines, stating that she doesn't want any more complications in her life.
9. Maxie leaves Nathan after learning about his past violent actions. Nathan begs her to stay, but Maxie needs time to process the information. Nathan insists that they can work through it together, but Maxie is unsure about their future.

1. Sonny Corinthos has been shot and is being attended to by paramedics. Jason Morgan and TJ are at the scene, and it is unclear who shot Sonny or why. Sam Morgan is also present and is trying to get more information.
2. Anna Devane is discussing her relationship with Sloane, who has been working for Nikolas Cassadine. Sloane tampered with a mayoral election and was not going to turn Nikolas in as Anna had asked, which has caused a rift in their relationship.
3. Carly Corinthos is getting ready for her wedding to Sonny, but he has not yet arrived. She is surrounded by her family and friends, including her mother Bobbie, her sons Michael and Morgan, her daughter Josslyn, and her close friends Maxie and Lulu.

1. Ms. Gilbert, a patient with end-stage AIDS, is stable after a procedure where Dr. Drake pricked himself and was exposed to her blood.
2. Alan advises Dr. Drake to get tested for HIV and Hepatitis B and C, and to start post-exposure prophylaxes (PEP) immediately.
3. Nikolas thanks Alfred for trying to set him up with Emily, and Alfred brings up the topic of Nikolas' son needing a mother.
4. Sonny is angry with Dr. Winters for blaming his mother for the abuse he suffered as a child.
5. Emily confronts Sonny about his behavior towards his therapist and his medication.
6. Emily and Nikolas take John for a walk in the meadow, and Alfred predicts they will be a couple again soon.
7. Lucky informs Sam that a file connecting Jason with the Escobars went missing, and Sam defends Jason and their relationship.
8. Carly advises Sonny to trust his therapist and work the program to fix what's broken.
9. Robin explains to Dr. Drake what to expect after starting PEP, including possible side effects and stages of acceptance.
10. Elizabeth and Lucky discuss the promotion he received for killing Manny, which he now knows Jason actually did.

1. Sonny and Alexis have a conversation about their jobs and the stress that comes with them. Sonny suspects that Alexis's stress might be due to a diversion from something else, possibly an attraction to her boss, Mayor Floyd. Alexis denies this and mentions that Ric thinks she's attracted to the mayor as well. Sonny then brings up the fact that Ric has been acting differently lately, and Alexis confirms that they have been having issues with loyalty being the main point of contention.
2. Lucky, who is addicted to pain pills, cheats on Elizabeth with Maxie. When confronted, he blames his actions on his father, Luke, and his desire to live up to his father's legacy. Emily and Nikolas try to help Lucky, but Emily mentions that an addict has to decide to help themselves. Lulu, who overhears the conversation, decides to call Elizabeth and tell her about Lucky's infidelity.
3. Sam, who is drunk, tells Jason about Ric and her one-night stand. She mentions that Ric only slept with her to get revenge on Jason and that she plans on telling him the truth. Ric tries to stop her, but Sam threatens him, saying that he is a dead man.
4. Elizabeth, who has left Lucky, finds comfort in Jason's arms. They both acknowledge that their night together is a one-time thing and that they have no regrets. In the morning, Elizabeth leaves, and Jason reflects on his actions, realizing that he has hurt Sam.

1. Patrick struggles to change Jake's diaper, leading to laughter from Robin. Patrick questions what mothers feed babies, as he finds them to be like "stink bombs." Robin is on couch rest, so Patrick is left to take care of Jake.
2. Carly reassures Jax that she is not pregnant, but Jax is not convinced and suggests getting a home pregnancy test. Carly is worried about how Jax will react if she can't have a baby.
3. Sonny and Kate discuss the idea of a prenup, with Sonny expressing his concerns about Kate's assets being at risk due to his past criminal activities.
4. Jason's fever breaks, and Claudia helps take care of him. Spinelli feels unwell, and Jason and Claudia suspect he may have the same virus that Jason had.
5. Maxie and Johnny are stuck in an elevator, and Maxie tries to flirt with Johnny. Johnny is not interested and questions Maxie's motivations.
6. Lulu and Logan run into each other, and Logan tries to warn Lulu about the dangers of being involved with Johnny. Lulu tells Logan that she is aware of the risks but is still choosing to be with Johnny.
7. Kate and Sonny continue to discuss the prenup, with Kate expressing her concerns about Sonny's past criminal activities and the potential risks to her assets.
8. Carly tells Jax that she can't imagine being pregnant and having a new baby while Michael is still in a coma. Jax reassures Carly that having a new baby won't lessen her love for Michael.
9. Maxie continues to try to convince Johnny to leave Lulu, citing her fragility and the potential risks to her mental health.
10. Jason and Claudia take Spinelli to the hospital, where they learn that he is not contagious but his fever is still dangerously high. Jason worries about Spinelli's condition, as sometimes the worst happens.

1. Sam McCall, a character in the source document, requests that Dr. Finn call her back with test results as soon as possible, as it will affect her decisions. She is worried about passing the illness onto her unborn child.
2. Kevin Collins, another character, is trying to get out of his hospital bed after being shot and recovering from a fever. Laura Spencer, a friend, tries to stop him but Kevin thanks her for saving his life.
3. Ava Jerome discovers someone has broken into her home and confronts Holt, who says he was worried after neighbors reported shouting. Ava realizes he is there to talk about her brother and implies she would not oppose a plan to help him escape.
4. Julian Jerome is in prison and his attorney, Scotty Baldwin, visits him. Julian is unsure if his family knows Scotty is there.
5. Kristina Corinthos-Davis and Aaron voluntarily work at a diner together. Kristina wants to clear the air about her relationship with Parker, a woman, and why she lied about it.
6. Alexis Davis, Julian's ex-wife, visits him in prison and wants him to tear up divorce papers. She still wants to be his wife and start over in a place without history or mob ties.
7. Sam finds out she is pregnant and is worried about passing malaria onto her unborn child. Elizabeth Webber, a friend, supports her and offers to accompany her to the hospital.
8. Laura and Kevin receive their malaria test results and are both negative. Laura had previously forgotten that Nikolas died a hero on Cassadine Island.

1. Danny, Sonny's son, is having trouble sleeping and has been trying to climb out of his crib. Sam and Silas are discussing Danny's behavior and Silas mentions that Kiki, Sonny's daughter, is also Silas's daughter.
2. Carly enters the room and informs Silas and Sam that Franco, a serial killer and Ava's ex-boyfriend, has been found not guilty due to his tumor affecting his ability to tell right from wrong. Kiki, who is present, is shocked to hear that Franco is her father.
3. Meanwhile, Tracy and Ava are discussing Franco's acquittal on television. Tracy doesn't believe that Franco was found not guilty and Ava mentions that Franco is now trending on Twitter with the hashtag "Franco's a free man."
4. At the hospital, Brad and Felix are discussing Brad's decision not to take care of his and Britt's baby. Felix criticizes Brad for not stepping up as a father and Brad becomes defensive.
5. Britt has just given birth and is worried about her baby's breathing. Sabrina, who delivered the baby, is taking the baby to the hospital for treatment.
6. Sonny is missing and his family is worried about him. Carly, Michael, Morgan, and Olivia are all searching for him and trying to make sure he is okay.

1. Jerry Jacks has taken Alexis Davis hostage and is planning to escape with her on a boat. Sonny Corinthos and Jax are determined to rescue Alexis and her daughter, Kristina. Jerry reveals to Jax that he is dying from radiation sickness caused by a bullet laced with polonium-210.
2. Tracy Quartermaine is desperate to save her father, Edward, who is also dying from the pathogen in the water. Patrick Drake has synthesized an antidote using Tracy's blood, but there is only enough for one dose. Tracy demands that her father receives the antidote, leading to a heated argument with Monica Quartermaine.
3. Meanwhile, Johnny Zacchara has been shot and is being taken to the hospital. Carly Corinthos is worried that Johnny is dying and may reveal a secret to her before he dies. Todd Manning offers to accompany Carly to the hospital, but she wants to be alone with Johnny.
4. At the hospital, McBain is trying to defuse the bomb attached to the antidote. Lulu and Dante are helping him, but they struggle to find the green wire that needs to be cut. McBain eventually decides to defuse the bomb alone, telling Dante and Lulu to find cover.

1. Gus discovers that Harley's nephew, Rafe, is his son with Natalia. Harley reveals this information to Gus after finding out from Remy. Natalia is scared to tell Gus because she thinks he will leave her again.
2. Beth is preparing to leave for Paris to visit her friend Mindy. She is waiting for her daughter, Lizzie, to meet her for lunch before they go to the airport.

1. Tracy insists on joining Luke in his quest to find Jerry Jacks, who has a cure for Luke's polonium 210 poisoning. Luke initially refuses, but Tracy argues that she can help and that she has a personal stake in the matter since Jerry owes her $18 million.
2. Nikolas and Laura discuss Elizabeth's recent confession about Stavros forcing her to marry him and how it led to Nikolas getting shot. Lulu overhears their conversation and reveals that she was the one who had Nikolas shot as punishment for not going along with Stavros' demands.
3. Shawn tells Alexis that he didn't shoot Olivia, and she is relieved but still uncomfortable with the fact that he kills people for a living. Shawn asks if she would end their relationship over his job, and Alexis says yes.
4. Carly confronts Franco about hiring a hitman to kill him, but Franco reveals that he has leverage over her - he knows that she tried to have him killed. Franco demands that Morgan be allowed to stay with him and Kiki, or he will tell Morgan about Carly's attempted hit.
5. Michael tells AJ that he accidentally saw Kiki topless, and AJ reminds him that she is his cousin. Michael asks for his help in staying away from Kiki, and AJ suggests that he spend more time with his grandmother or at the office.
6. Lulu tells Nikolas and Laura that she found out the sex of her baby - it's a girl. She is excited but also worried about her father's recent behavior and plans to confront him about it.
7. Tracy and Luke make plans to leave town together to find Jerry Jacks. Luke writes a note to leave behind, and Tracy packs a suitcase full of cash and ball gowns.
8. Elizabeth confronts Nikolas about not telling her that he and Carly were not together when she thought AJ cheated on her. Nikolas argues that he didn't want to influence her decision about their relationship.
9. Alexis gives Shawn an ultimatum - he has to quit working for Sonny if they want to stay together. Shawn agrees to her terms, and they reconcile.

1. Carly is not allowed to leave Roselawn for Christmas, and she is upset about not being able to spend the holiday with her sons, Michael and Morgan. She asks Courtney to spend Christmas with them and fill in for her. Courtney agrees, but she has already made plans with Nikolas.
2. Alexis is appointed to defend Manny Ruiz, who is facing criminal charges. She visits him in the hospital and he requests her to be his attorney. Alexis is hesitant because she believes he is guilty, but Manny insists that he wants her to represent him.

1. Spinelli and his girlfriend Ellie are considering moving to Portland, Oregon for Ellie's job. Spinelli's girlfriend is pregnant with his child and Maxie, the baby's mother, has told them to take the baby and leave town. Maxie is struggling with the loss of her daughter and is trying to be strong, but Robin is concerned she may not be able to handle the separation.

2. Franco has killed his mother, Heather Webber, and has not told anyone. He is worried that if he tells the police, they will not believe that he killed her in self-defense and will instead lock him up for the rest of his life. Heather had been threatening Carly, Franco's girlfriend, and Franco had warned Heather that he would kill her if she made a move against Carly. Franco has buried Heather's body in a cemetery.

1. Claudia and Johnny are looking at an apartment with a view of the harbor and Nikolas Cassadine's island. Claudia mentions that she will be moving to Sonny's house soon, as she has agreed to marry him as part of a business deal between Sonny and her father, Anthony. Sonny is taking over the Zacchara organization and marrying Claudia as a show of good faith.
2. Jason is making plans to put Elizabeth and the boys in one of his safe houses, but Elizabeth and the boys have already left for a cabin. Elizabeth calls Jason to let him know they arrived safely, but their cell phones do not work at the cabin and the Russians have cut the land line. Sam notices the Russians are outside the cabin.
3. Nikolas and Jax are in a dispute over Jax's plan to build a resort on Spoon Island. Nikolas' attorneys are trying to block the sale, but Jax is confident the deal will go through. Carly proposes a compromise where Nikolas sells his shares of the Metro Court back to her and Jax, and Nikolas sells Spoon Island to Jax. Jax declines the offer.
4. Johnny is upset about his sister Claudia's decision to marry Sonny. He feels guilty for saving his father's life, which led to Claudia's decision to marry Sonny for the good of the family. Lulu tries to reassure Johnny that Claudia is making her own choices and he has nothing to feel guilty about.

1. Lizzie reveals to Ava that Beth went to a fertility clinic, causing a rift in their relationship.
2. Rick is reluctant to host the annual Bauer barbecue due to his recent separation from Beth.
3. Beth and Alan plan a new tradition, the Spaulding picnic, but Rick's absence poses a problem.
4. Bill and Ava discuss their strained marriage and make plans to attend the Bauer barbecue.
5. Lizzie confronts Bill about his marriage and reveals that the baby may not be his, causing tension.
6. Beth goes to convince Rick to attend the barbecue, emphasizing its importance to him and others.
7. Alan falls in the basement but insists on attending the barbecue, leading to a heartfelt conversation with Rick.
8. The barbecue commences with Rick as the grillmaster, and everyone enjoys the festivities.

1. Sonny Corinthos is getting married to Kate Howard, but there are several interruptions and delays during the wedding ceremony. Olivia, who is not feeling well, interrupts the ceremony to give a speech about how lucky Kate is to be marrying her first love, Sonny. Milo, one of Sonny's men, also interrupts to wish the couple a happy marriage. Sonny becomes frustrated and asks the judge to hurry up the ceremony. Just as the judge is about to declare them married, Trey, Kristina's husband, interrupts to say that Kristina is not present.

2. Meanwhile, Joe Scully Jr., Trey's father, has kidnapped Kristina and is holding her hostage in Sonny's warehouse. He plans to kill her and make it look like one of Sonny's enemies did it, so that Trey will inherit all of Kristina's money. Kristina tries to negotiate for her release, but Joe Jr. is not interested. He tells Kristina that she has a smart mouth and a lot of fire, and that's why Trey fell for her.

3. Back at the wedding, Connie, Kate's alternate personality, interrupts the ceremony to say that she cannot marry Sonny because she is already married...to Joe Scully Jr. The guests are shocked, and Sonny is devastated. Connie explains that she had to be truthful when the judge asked if there were any objections to the marriage. Sonny is confused and asks Kate what is going on, but she simply repeats that she cannot marry him because she is already married.

1. Tracy suggests having grilled salmon for dinner, and Paul agrees. Paul is distracted and avoids looking at Tracy, who notices something is wrong. Paul reveals he has just mailed his divorce papers, and the finality of it has hit him.
2. Ava is desperate to find a flash drive that contains incriminating evidence against her. She believes Scott has it, but he claims it has been stolen. Ava threatens Scott, reminding him that if Ric Lansing has the flash drive, she could be recharged with Connie's murder.
3. At the hospital, Carly is worried about Morgan, who has been acting erratically since his father was shot. Michael reveals that Morgan has a gun and intends to kill Julian Jerome. Carly fears that if Morgan goes through with it, he will ruin his life.
4. At Alexis' lake house, Julian is touched by her thoughtful surprise. However, their romantic moment is cut short when Alexis reveals the real reason she rented the lake house - to hide Julian until they can prove his innocence in Sonny's shooting.
5. Dillon is frustrated when a cease and desist order is issued, halting production on his movie. Tracy suggests he call her old friend, Mayor Janice Lomax, for help. Paul reveals he knows the mayor from law school and offers to intervene.
6. At the hospital, Michael goes to find Morgan, who has disappeared. Carly insists on finding him before he can harm Julian. Meanwhile, Morgan confronts Julian, determined to avenge his father's shooting.
7. Patrick has a birthday party with his family and friends. Emma, his daughter, helps plan the celebration, and Sam gives him a guitar as a gift. Patrick is overwhelmed with gratitude and tells Sam he wants to marry her.

1. Jason, Max, and Sam discuss Franco and his recent appearance at his art studio. Franco has been sending Jason pictures and has a fascination with him. Jason is determined to confront Franco to find out what he knows about Michael killing Claudia. Sam is worried about Jason's safety and asks him to wear a vest, but Jason refuses.

2. Carly and Sonny discuss how to handle the situation with Michael killing Claudia. Sonny wants Michael to come live with him and for Carly not to go to the cops or talk to a lawyer. Carly agrees not to say anything but wants to find another way to save her son.

3. Olivia and Johnny discuss their relationship and Olivia's feelings for Sonny. Johnny is upset that Olivia has been lying to him and is unsure if he should stay with her. Olivia tells Johnny that he can either take her as she is or end the relationship. Johnny decides to stay with her.

4. Maxie and Sam discuss the man-cave makeover for Spinelli's place. Maxie is trying to compensate for the fact that something happened with Franco. Sam is worried about Maxie's safety and tells her to be careful.

5. Rebecca and Ethan discuss Nikolas and how he ran Rebecca over with his car. Ethan wants to arrest Nikolas, but Lucky tells him it was an accident. Rebecca is upset with Nikolas and wants to move away from Port Charles.

6. Jason goes to Franco's art studio to confront him. Franco is excited to meet Jason and invites him in. Jason is cautious and tells Franco that he doesn't want to be aggressive. Franco tells Jason that he just wants to be friends.

1. Cassie and Jeffrey are planning to attend a grown-up party together, but the same night is also RJ's kids' party. Cassie is worried about changing RJ's party, but Jeffrey insists on attending the kids' party to be a good male influence. They compromise by having Jeffrey come over for cake and ice cream after the party. Meanwhile, Dinah is trying to get Edmund to admit to kidnapping her so she can use it against him. Bill comes in and interrupts them, and Dinah lies to him about why Edmund was there. Bill then asks Dinah to be part of a family photo session with Olivia and Emma. Dinah is hesitant because of her past, but Bill insists that she is part of their family.

2. Reva has discovered that Nate, her boss, is actually Jonathan's adoptive father, Alfred. She wants him to suffer for what he has done to Jonathan. Olivia suggests calling the police, but Reva wants to find a way to keep Nate away from Jonathan without involving the authorities. They argue about the best course of action, and Nate overhears them. He tries to leave, but Reva stops him and asks for her job back. Nate is surprised but agrees to hire her again. Meanwhile, Tammy and Sandy have broken up because of Jonathan's manipulations. Sandy tells Tammy that he still cares about her but needs some time apart to regain trust.

1. Shayne is enjoying his newfound fame as a professional baseball player, but he appreciates the normalcy of being around people who knew him before he was famous, like his friends Marina, Remy, and Lizzie. Buzz makes him a special sandwich and tells him that he will always be a part of the community.
2. Eden is being questioned by Gus about her potential involvement in the murders of Ariana, Renee, and the coroner. Gus presents a motive: that she is protecting herself and her escort service from Vinnie Salerno. Eden denies any involvement and maintains her innocence.
3. Cassie is helping Jeffrey move out of the Beacon Hotel after a disagreement. Jeffrey tries to reason with her, but Cassie is firm in her decision.
4. Mitch Hendon is being questioned by Ross and Gus about the attack on Ben Reade. Ben has recalled details of the attack, including the smell of a particular aftershave, which leads him to identify Mitch as his attacker. Gus and Ross plan to bring Mitch in for questioning.

1. Alexandra is hosting a fundraiser and Cyrus is helping her. Alexandra wants to outshine her brother, Alan, in running the family business.
2. Cyrus tries to involve Griggs in a scheme to steal money from the fundraiser, but Griggs only wants to retire after the event.
3. Frank doesn't want Harley to attend the fundraiser alone, fearing for her safety around Cyrus. Dinah tells Matt that his mother is at the fundraiser with Billy.
4. Natalia is going to the fundraiser with Alan, which upsets Gus. They argue about Alan's intentions with Natalia.
5. Cyrus steals donations from the fundraiser and tries to transfer the money. Mallet and Marina talk while she is on duty at the fundraiser.
6. Billy and Vanessa run into each other at the fundraiser and clear the air about their past. Matt sees Vanessa with Billy and gets upset.
7. Gus and Natalia reminisce about their past and laugh together. Gus asks Natalia to dance, and they enjoy the moment.
8. Harley confronts Cyrus about his behavior towards Marina. Cyrus tries to justify his actions, but Harley is not convinced.
9. Matt sees Dinah talking to another man and gets jealous. Dinah tells Matt that she has feelings for him and wants to be with him.

1. Alan Spaulding confesses to shooting his son Phillip, claiming self-defense and entrapment. However, his family, including his granddaughter Lizzie, confronts him with the truth.
2. Cassie approaches Jonathan for help in proving that Edmund is an unfit parent to prevent him from taking her baby away. She wants him to press charges against Edmund for the recent beating.
3. Dinah confesses to Edmund that she lost their baby due to stress and tension. She apologizes for not being able to tell him and hopes they can still have a future together.
4. Gus and Harley confront Alan about his crime, but he denies any wrongdoing and tries to blame Harley for framing him. The family argues, and Lizzie demands the truth from her grandfather.
5. After realizing that Alan is guilty, Lizzie confronts him, and he is arrested for Phillip's murder. The physical evidence and a note from a witness confirm his guilt.
6. Dinah and Jonathan commiserate about their love troubles. Dinah expresses her feelings of emptiness and loss, while Jonathan advises her to focus on herself and protect herself from further hurt.
7. Edmund tries to reconcile with Cassie, expressing his love and desire to start over. However, Cassie believes that their past mistakes make a future together impossible.
8. Gus confronts Alan about his actions and expresses his disappointment before Alan is taken away by the police.
9. Tammy stands up to Jonathan, warning him not to hurt Sandy. Jonathan reveals that he and Sandy have been spending time together, causing tension between Tammy and Sandy.

1. Shayne is missing and Reva is worried about him. Josh and Jeffrey try to reassure her and suggest that she focus on taking care of herself and the baby. Josh volunteers to find Shayne.
2. Beth is torn about her relationship with Coop, who is Buzz's son and Lizzie's half-brother. Buzz warns Beth that she will break Coop's heart and advises her to end the relationship.
3. Lizzie is determined to stay in Springfield and clear Bill's name, despite the Macau deal being in jeopardy. Alan tries to persuade her to join him and the family on a trip to China, but Lizzie refuses.
4. Coop invites Beth to go on a trip to Telluride with him, but Beth is hesitant because she wants to spend Christmas with her kids and Alan has invited the whole family to China on business.
5. Josh finds Shayne and informs Reva that he is safe. Shayne's prior car accident may have affected his current condition, but Shayne is reluctant to let Josh help him.
6. Beth tells Alan that she is not going to China because she has a law workshop in Minneapolis. Alan has booked first-class tickets for her to Macau, where the Macau deal is located.

1. In a scene between Tess and Nash, Tess expresses her desire to stay in her new life and be free. Nash encourages her to dream and find her own vineyard, suggesting that she is stuck between her old and new life.
2. In a conversation between Blair and her daughter Starr, Blair apologizes for spying on Starr's instant messages and Starr expresses her frustration with her social life and wishes for different parents.
3. In a scene with Todd and his lawyer Rich, Todd inquires about setting up a stock portfolio for his niece Jessica and offers Rich a commission for his help. Rich reveals that he has spoken with Jessica and agrees to help Todd, but Todd insists that Viki not be involved.

1. Todd and Blair have a conversation about their past mistakes and the possibility of change. Blair tells Todd that she has forgiven him for his past actions, including trying to pass another baby off as their deceased son, Jack. Todd expresses his love for Blair, and she reveals that she has wanted to be with him for a long time.

2. In other relationships, Roxy and Max are getting a divorce, and Asa and Rae are having issues with their divorce proceedings. Rae refuses to sign the divorce papers unless Asa agrees to give her 90% of his fortune, leading to a heated argument. Meanwhile, Antonio and Keri's father, R.J., discuss Keri's pregnancy and the challenges ahead. Jen and Marcie discuss a plan for Jen to come clean about her lies regarding Cristian's involvement in Mitch Laurence's shooting.

1. Nora is surprised to find Clint at home instead of staying over at Dorian's place. Clint explains that Dorian decided to bunk in with David Vickers and Viki.
2. David Vickers tries to convince Viki to sleep with him, but Viki refuses.
3. John books a room for Marty and Cole at the Angel Square Hotel for their safety.
4. Sarah is questioned about Todd's disappearance and her involvement with Hunter.
5. Miles is shocked to find Todd in a body bag and accuses Hunter of going beyond their agreement.
6. Marcie and Michael talk about their future and their hopes for their son.
7. Dorian and Clint argue about Dorian's reaction to Viki inviting David Vickers to stay with her.
8. Blair decides to stay in Chicago to find Todd, despite the detective's advice to let the police handle it.
9. Marty confronts Miles about his involvement in Todd's disappearance and warns him about the consequences if he goes to the police.

1. Natalie wants to get champagne, and Paul is suspicious that she might be brushing him off. Natalie insists that she is thinking about him only.
2. Kelly is worried that Paul might find out that a baby is missing, and Kevin is looking for their mother, Viki, who is missing from Llanfair.
3. Jessica informs Todd that Viki is not at Llanfair and might have gone somewhere to think after receiving bad news from her angiogram.
4. Michael thinks that someone is stalking him, and John informs him that without any proof, there is nothing that can be done.
5. Marcie wants to take advantage of the opportunity to get evidence against Dr. Long, who she thinks stole a heart from a patient. Michael tries to stop her.
6. Natalie and John plan to meet the next day, and Paul decides to stay in the room with Natalie, who is in no condition to drive.
7. Viki has had a coronary and is now in the hospital. Dorian is there to support her, and Todd asks Viki not to scare them like that again.

1. Sheridan, a character in the source document, has been in a fire and is currently in the hospital. Her husband, Antonio, is worried about her and is determined to stay by her side. The fire is believed to be arson, and Antonio vows to find out who is responsible.
2. Another character, Liz, has revealed a traumatic experience from her past to T.C., who has been supportive and offered to help her. However, Liz has also expressed her desire to win T.C.'s affections, which could potentially cause problems in his marriage with Eve.

<summary>

1. Viki is worried about her daughter Natalie's safety, who has gone missing, and believes that Marcie, who wrote a book that the killer is using as a guide, might have some answers.
2. Marcie regrets writing the book and feels responsible for Natalie's situation, but Viki is more concerned about finding her daughter than comforting Marcie.
3. Marcie has been helping John with the investigation by sharing information from her book and journals.
4. Rex is upset about Natalie's kidnapping and feels responsible for it since he came up with the idea of writing a phony note to bring Natalie and John closer.
5. Nora is worried that she might have contracted H.I.V. from her ex-husband, Daniel, and is awaiting test results.
6. Todd has information about Jessica, who has gone missing, but is not willing to share it with Viki and Antonio.
7. Tess, who is out for a joyride, manages to steal a car from a valet parking attendant by pretending to be the car owner's wife.
8. John and Marcie are trying to get inside the killer's head to understand his motives and find Natalie.
9. Lindsay comforts Rex and tells him that he is a good person who has changed for the better.
10. Nora's H.I.V. test results come back negative, much to Bo's relief.

</summary>

1. Blair is frustrated with the Chicago Police Department's lack of concern about Todd's disappearance. She and John discuss the recording that Bo found, which Bo thinks is insignificant, but John and Blair suspect Miles of knowing more than he lets on.
2. Marty's car runs out of gas, and she is accosted by three men. She manages to fend them off with mace and is later given a ride home by Miles, who happened to drive by at the right moment. John is suspicious of Miles' presence at the scene.
3. Clint and Viki discuss Jessica's situation. Jessica has told Antonio that their marriage is over, and she is in love with Nash. Clint and Viki brainstorm ways to help Jessica, including reaching out to their contacts at the National Institutes of Health.
4. Cristian and Antonio argue over Jessica and Nash. Antonio accuses Cristian of helping Nash and Jessica deceive him, and Cristian admits that he knew about the affair but didn't tell Antonio because Jessica begged him not to.
5. Nash assures Jessica that they will find a donor and be together. Jessica is unsure about their future, but Nash is optimistic.
6. John takes Marty to the police station to file a report about the assault. He is still suspicious of Miles and questions him about his whereabouts during the assault.
7. Blair plans to be tested as a potential donor for Jessica. Dorian and Blair discuss Jessica's condition and Viki and Clint's distress.

1. Dorian reveals to Kelly that Reed Wagner, a visitor from London, is in Llanview. Reed knows a lot about Kelly and offers his condolences regarding her mother's death.
2. Brody talks to Clint about a frat boy prank and mentions he will be in touch with Jessica about the prom. Natalie and Rex discuss a necklace that belonged to Rex's mother. Gigi serves Ford a beer, and Markko and Langston discuss Cole and Starr's situation.
3. Dani visits Todd in the hospital and expresses her relief that he didn't die, as it would have ruined Cole's life. Todd brings up their moment in the gym and asks if Dani still wants to give him a chance.
4. Markko and Langston argue about Hannah's claim that Todd pushed Marty down the stairs. Markko wants to enjoy his pizza and not fight, while Langston believes Starr doesn't think Hannah is telling the truth.
5. Natalie is glad she's off the hook for Marty's assault, and Brody mentions that he doesn't think John thought she was guilty. They discuss prom corsages, and Brody thanks Natalie for her help with Jessica.
6. Blair discovers Téa in her office, where she accidentally knocked things over due to losing her temper over Todd's situation. Blair confronts Téa about defending Todd, who she believes is guilty of pushing Marty down the stairs and killing her baby. Téa reveals that she is defending Todd for Dani's sake, as she is worried about her daughter losing another father figure.

1. Kelly and Rex get stuck in the women's steam room due to a misunderstanding about the location. Rex feels bad about a conversation he had with his ex-wife Gigi, which led to Gigi confronting Kelly.
2. Gigi is upset with Rex for implying to his ex-wife that they are not having sex. Adriana overhears the confrontation and gets involved, causing a rift between her and Gigi.
3. Cristian and Layla have plans for the weekend, but Adriana needs their help with a work emergency. Gigi notices the tension and warns Layla to stay away from Cristian.
4. Natalie had an amniocentesis test, but did not tell John. He finds out from Marty and is upset that Natalie did not include him in the decision.
5. Ford and James have a strained relationship with their father Eddie, who has just been released from jail. Eddie wants to stay with them, but they are hesitant.
6. Starr and Cole say their goodbyes as he prepares to go to prison for 10 years. Cole asks Langston and Markko to take care of Starr and Hope.
7. Inez brings food to Bobby, who is sick and unable to cook. She mentions that she is coming to Dani's party and invites Clint.
8. Rex and Kelly discuss their love lives. Kelly reveals that she hasn't had sex in a while and that Dorian hired a masseur for her, who turned out to be a hooker.
9. Gigi and Adriana get into a physical fight at the fashion show. Adriana is upset that Layla is staying in Paris instead of going to Milan for the show.
10. Eddie shows up at Inez's apartment, causing tension. He reveals that he knows Nate is his son and makes disparaging comments about Inez and Nate. Inez takes Nate and leaves with Ford and James.

1. Jessica is getting Chloe baptized and many family members are present for the occasion, including Clint, Viki, Charlie, Jared, and Natalie. Clint is happy to see his granddaughter Bree, and Viki mentions that Clint is known as the "spoiler" in their family.
2. Nora is working on a serial killer case with Bo and is unable to attend the christening. She calls to apologize and mentions that they have made a break in the case. They found a knife with Blair's blood on it and are hoping to get a confession from the suspect, Zach Rosen.
3. Todd and Téa are in a sexual situation and Todd wants Téa to help him get temporary custody of his children. Téa realizes this and tells him that he doesn't actually want her, he just wants her to help him with his custody battle.
4. Markko tells Langston that Cole was freaked out because rehab pulled a drug test on him and he took a painkiller. Cole asked Markko for a sample so he could substitute it and avoid testing positive.
5. Starr is grateful that Cole was there when Zach Rosen attacked her, but she is upset that he told her father about her relationship with Mr. Joplin. Cole explains that he was worried about her and wanted to protect her.
6. Michael and Marcie attend the christening and Michael mentions that he still has moments where he thinks about their lost child, Tommy. Marcie agrees and Jessica arrives with Chloe.
7. Natalie mentions to Viki that she had to make sure she had forgiven Jessica before agreeing to be Chloe's godmother. Viki encourages Natalie and Jessica's relationship, but Natalie mentions that she is worried about Jessica relapsing.
8. Brody approaches Jessica at the cemetery and apologizes for hurting her. Jessica accepts his apology but tells him that it's too hard for her to be friends with him right now, especially since he is with Gigi.

1. Whitney expresses her desire to become a singer, which Chad supports. However, Chad advises her to do it for herself and not as a way to punish her mother for her relationship with Julian.
2. Whitney admits that her anger towards her mother is not the primary reason for her pursuit of a singing career. She reveals that she has dreamed of becoming a singer her whole life.
3. Rebecca overhears Whitney and Chad's conversation and devises a plan to destroy Whitney's family.
4. Miguel contemplates dropping out of college to cut back on expenses, but Luis and Pilar insist that he stays in school.
5. Theresa witnesses Rebecca abusing Little Ethan through a video hookup and calls child protective services.
6. Rebecca asks Ethan to evict Pilar and her family from their home, which is owned by Crane Industries. Ethan refuses, and Rebecca threatens to fire him.
7. Rebecca fires Ethan for refusing to evict Pilar and her family, and Ethan tells Gwen about it.
8. T.C. suspects that Chad is the reason for Whitney's emotional upheaval and tells Eve about his findings. Eve becomes worried that Whitney may want to return to the music business.

1. Kevin Buchanan and Kelly Cramer discuss David Vickers' sudden reappearance in Llanview and his request for Kelly to put in a good word with Dorian. Kevin is skeptical of David's feelings for Dorian, but Kelly wonders if it's possible that he's telling the truth.
2. Asa Buchanan has hired a private detective to find dirt on Willy Dawes, the ex-lieutenant governor who is causing trouble for Kevin in Harrisburg. The detective has discovered that Dawes has a history of hiring hookers.
3. Cristian Vega is tasked by Asa to find a beautiful woman who is willing to go along with their plans to discredit Dawes. Cristian is hesitant, as Kevin has made it clear he doesn't want to stoop to Dawes' level.
4. Antonio Vega is in court, fighting for joint custody of his daughter Jamie with Keri Reynolds. R.J. Gannon, Keri's father, is adamant that Antonio should not be allowed anywhere near his granddaughter.
5. Marcie Walsh is at the hospital, visiting her boyfriend Al Holden, who is seriously ill. Al needs a liver transplant to survive, and Marcie is determined to help him in any way she can.
6. Todd Manning has set up a surprise for Natalie Balsom, but he won't reveal what it is until she guesses. He plays a song on the piano, and Natalie is touched by the gesture.
7. David Vickers is trying to woo Kelly away from Kevin Buchanan, but he is constantly interrupted by Dorian Lord, who is also interested in Kelly. Dorian motivates David to find someone to talk to about what she's done to him.
8. Evangeline Williamson is called to the stand in the custody case and is questioned about her decision to offer Antonio a job as a private investigator. She is adamant that she was not worried about his violent behavior.
9. Keri Reynolds testifies about the abuse she suffered at the hands of Antonio and reveals that her father, R.J., saw one of the attacks. R.J. is convinced that Antonio is a menace to his daughter and granddaughter.
10. The judge grants joint custody of Jamie to Antonio and Keri

1. A heated argument breaks out between T.C., Eve, Whitney, and their respective partners regarding Whitney giving up her baby for adoption. T.C. blames Eve for Whitney's decision, while Eve insists she tried to convince Whitney otherwise.
2. Meanwhile, at the Crane mansion, Sheridan, Luis, and Mrs. Wallace discuss the possibility of a DNA test to determine Marty's parentage. Beth is against the test and her behavior raises suspicions.
3. Gwen and Theresa have a confrontation over Jane's custody. Gwen threatens to kill Theresa if she tries to take Jane away.
4. Julian expresses his desire to be a part of Endora's life, but Tabitha is against it due to Julian's past mistakes.
5. Ethan and Fox discuss the possibility of Ethan having to choose between Gwen and Theresa. Fox points out that Ethan seems to be leaning towards Theresa.
6. Gwen becomes increasingly unstable and threatens to kill Theresa. Katherine intervenes and tries to calm the situation.
7. Liz suggests to T.C. that they adopt Whitney's baby as a way to make up for the loss of their own child. T.C. agrees it's a great idea.
8. Julian and Eve also express their desire to adopt Whitney's baby as they feel a connection to the child due to their grandparentage.

1. Kay and Miguel are excited to get married and raise Kay's daughter, Maria, together. However, they are worried about how to tell Fox, Kay's other partner, about their plans.
2. Rebecca is taking care of Ethan, Gwen's husband, while Gwen is away. Rebecca is tempted to take advantage of the situation, but ultimately decides against it.
3. Gwen and Theresa are both trying to pay J.T. to get information that will help them in their respective conflicts with each other.
4. Luis, Fancy's father, is searching for Fancy, who has gone missing. He and his friends suspect that Chris, Fancy's ex-boyfriend, may be involved.
5. Fox is considering a plan to win Kay back from Miguel by showing her that he can provide a better life for their daughter.
6. Miguel and Kay are struggling with guilt over breaking off Kay's engagement to Fox, who has recently received some bad medical news.
7. Rebecca's attempt to seduce Ethan is interrupted when he wakes up and realizes that she is not Gwen.
8. Gwen and Theresa are both trying to win Ethan's affections, and J.T. is playing them against each other in order to get paid by both of them.

1. Spike, Noah, Sam, Paloma, Simone, and Jessica are having an intervention for Jessica regarding her abusive relationship with Spike. Sam, Jessica's father, makes it clear that Spike will never hurt his daughter again.
2. Endora, a young witch, has sneaked some chocolate and shared it with Maria, who is now wide awake. Fox, Endora's half-brother, is trying to figure out where Endora got the chocolate from.
3. Fancy and Chris, both police officers, have a confrontation with Spike, who Chris mistakes for an intruder. Fancy and Luis are investigating a trespassing call on the grounds of the estate.
4. Luis and Sheridan are shown in a compromising position, much to Rebecca's dismay as Theresa is staying in the room right next door. Gwen and Ethan are also present in the hotel for a romantic getaway.
5. Spike tries to manipulate Jessica into not testifying against him in court. He threatens to reveal secrets about her if she does so.
6. Fancy and Chris discuss the undercover sting operation that was shown on the news. Fancy assures Chris that her relationship with Luis didn't mean anything.
7. Luis and Sheridan are shown in a heated argument about their past relationship. Sheridan insists that she wants to be with Chris and not Luis.

1. Whitney and Chad are discussing Whitney's mother's change of heart regarding Whitney moving to LA with Chad. Whitney's father, T.C., is upset about this decision and believes that Whitney's mother, Eve, is trying to undermine him. Julian tries to reassure Eve that everything will be okay, but Eve wants to handle the situation herself.
2. The search for Sheridan has been called off, and Antonio believes that she is in Paris relaxing. However, Beth knows that Sheridan is being held captive in her basement and is pleased that her plan is back on track. Kay goes into labor early, and there are complications with the pregnancy.
3. Julian admits to setting fire to Liz's club, claiming it was an accident. T.C. is upset and blames Julian for Whitney almost dying in the fire. Julian apologizes and takes responsibility for the accident.
4. Kay is taken to the hospital, and there are concerns about the baby's health. Grace, Sam, and Pilar are worried about Kay and the baby's condition. Meanwhile, Charity has a premonition about Tabitha's baby and is concerned about its health.
5. The arson investigation is closed, and Julian is not charged. T.C. is still suspicious about the fire and questions Eve about her whereabouts the night of the fire. Sheridan and Luis are reunited and are determined to be together despite the danger.
6. Luis is not convinced that Sheridan left on her own and wants to continue the search for her. Antonio is hesitant, but Luis insists, and the search is resumed. Beth is pleased that everyone believes Sheridan left on her own and continues with her plan to be with Luis.

1. Lily, Cane, and Tyler are dealing with various issues at work, including being stuck in an elevator and discussing fashion designs. Meanwhile, Neil and Leslie are getting to know each other better and discussing their pasts.
2. Fenmore is accused of pushing Jamie off a roof, and Michael and Lauren are trying to get to the bottom of what happened. Fenmore insists he is innocent, but Jamie is determined to press charges.
3. Chelsea's mother, Anita, encourages her to move on from her husband Adam and find a new man to have a fling with. Chelsea is hesitant, but Anita insists it will help her feel better.
4. Paul is trying to help Summer understand the consequences of her actions, including the bullying of Jamie. Lauren is struggling to cope with the possibility that her son Fenmore may have done something terrible.

1. Jack and Sharon are packing up the last of the boxes from the Abbott mansion, as Jack has been forced to move out due to a court decision. Sharon tries to comfort him by saying they will make a new home with new memories.
2. Kevin and Jana are discussing Gloria's party to celebrate her new ownership of the Abbott mansion, but Kevin is hesitant and says they cannot make it. Jana is disappointed, as she wants to celebrate with Gloria.
3. Victor is taking Sabrina to an art gallery, where they view various pieces of art and discuss their merits. Sabrina is trying to gauge Victor's interest in the art world and gauge his potential for making a donation to her museum.

1. Karen and Colleen discuss reducing a patient's medication dosage and plan to monitor the patient's response. Kevin approaches Karen for help with his addiction issues, but Karen is suspicious of his motives.
2. Ian, a vampire, struggles with his desire to feed on Lucy. He reveals to Chris, a doctor helping him, that he needs more blood to resist attacking Lucy. Chris agrees to help him, but Ian must be honest about his symptoms.
3. Lucy is distraught over Ian's sudden departure. Elizabeth arrives, seeking Lucy's help in finding Alison, who has been kidnapped by Joshua. Lucy reveals that she has lost her slayer powers and feels useless, but Elizabeth encourages her to use her intuition to help find Alison.
4. Alison confronts Joshua about his obsession with her family and his true intentions. Joshua reveals that he and Alison's father, Malcolm, were friends when they were young, but their relationship became strained as they grew older. Joshua admits to having a role in Malcolm's death but denies being the one who killed him.
5. Kevin admits to Karen that he has been working with an addiction specialist and is making progress. He wants to know the ingredients in the drug Joshua gave him to help with his treatment, but Karen is skeptical and refuses to give him the information.
6. Chris helps Ian by providing him with blood. Elizabeth pleads for help in finding Alison, who is in danger. Meanwhile, Rafe confronts Jamal, who is uncooperative in revealing Alison's location. Joshua praises Jamal for his help.

1. Nick, under Victor's guidance, has been buying up Jabot's debt with the intention of foreclosing and taking over the company.
2. Victor is unhappy with this decision, as he had promised the Abbotts that he would not take over Jabot.
3. Jack has been informed of this plan and calls an emergency meeting of the shareholders to discuss a countermeasure.
4. Malcolm and Dru are having issues, with Malcolm wanting to know the truth about a paternity test regarding Lily.
5. Devon is upset that Lily and her family forgot his birthday, and Lily tries to reassure him that he is a part of their family.
6. J.T. is worried about Mac spending time with Kevin Fisher, who bought her a dress and took her on a date.
7. Victor and Nick have a confrontation with the bankers holding Jabot's debt, with Victor offering to buy the debt himself to save the company.
8. Jack proposes that Chancellor Industries buy a 51% stake in Jabot to save it from Victor and Nicholas' plans.
9. Nikki confronts Victor about the situation, and Jack calls for a vote among the shareholders to approve Chancellor's stake in Jabot.

1. Victor Newman is in a legal battle with his daughters, Victoria and Abby, over the control of Newman Enterprises.
2. Victor's company is being audited by forensic accountants to determine the value of Victoria and Abby's trusts.
3. Victoria and Abby's lawyer, Vance Abrams, is trying to freeze one-third of Newman Enterprises' assets due to Victor's plan to sell a major holding in Dubai.
4. Victor's actions are seen as an attempt to devalue the company and prevent his daughters from receiving their rightful share.
5. Meanwhile, Jack Abbott is in Hawaii, investigating the disappearance of his ex-wife, Skye Lockhart.
6. Jack believes that Victor is behind Skye's disappearance and is trying to find evidence to prove it.
7. Jack finds a bottle of Skye's rare perfume in the ashes of a burned-down shack, leading him to believe that she was in Hawaii.
8. Jack tries to find a detective who can help him with his investigation, but no one seems to know anything.
9. Back in Genoa City, the judge rules in favor of freezing one-third of Newman Enterprises' assets, much to Victor's dismay.
10. Victor threatens to take legal action against his daughters if they continue with their case, but Victoria and Abby are determined to see it through.

1. Genevieve and Jack are getting married in Las Vegas, despite some logistical issues with Genevieve wanting to make her own arrangements to meet Jack there. Genevieve is excited about their future together, while Jack seems less certain.
2. Chelsea, who was hired by Victor to seduce Billy Abbott and then leave him, has become pregnant and is now planning to give the baby to Billy and Victoria to raise. Victor is disappointed that she didn't follow his original plan, and he fires her and tells her to leave town.
3. Michael and Lauren are discussing the custody hearing for their son Fen, who is currently living with his brother in Canada. Michael believes it's time for Fen to come home, but Lauren is worried about the influence of Daisy, who she believes is vicious and unpredictable.

1. Sharon asks Victor for help in proving Adam's innocence, but Victor refuses, stating that Adam created the situation he's in. Sharon reveals that she saw Skye in Hawaii, but the law enforcement there told the D.A. that there was nothing to back up her story, and they are now considering obstruction charges.
2. Leslie informs Adam that the D.A. is moving to get the trial on the court calendar and is planning to go for the maximum. Adam asks Leslie if she has an ace in the hole, to which she replies that if he does, now would be a good time to pull it out.
3. Nick tells Sharon that he is done waiting for her to come to her senses and will be filing for full custody of Faith as soon as Michael is free. Phyllis expresses her fear of losing Daniel, who is in critical condition after being found with a head injury and hypothermia.
4. Neil and Sofia are upset with Blake for doing a flimsy job on a rush assignment for a report they need for Tucker. Cane tries to defend Blake, but Neil and Sofia are not satisfied and plan to talk to him about it.
5. Colin expresses his desire to see his grandchildren and Blake agrees that they are his legacy. Lily makes an excuse to leave and Colin tells Blake that he needs to keep an eye on her, nothing else.
6. Jill cancels Lauren's appointments for the day and plans to call the person who has the information they need in person. Sharon asks Victor if he was the one who sent Skye out of town, but Victor denies it.
7. The police have sent Michael a photo taken less than an hour ago at an A.T.M. just over the Canadian border. Daisy crossed the border, but the C.I.C. has no record of it. At least they know she's far away and still pregnant.
8. Tucker plans a wedding with Sofia and Heather gets served.

1. Ricky is seeking help from his father, Paul, as he realizes he may have inherited some of his mother's destructive traits. He wants to start over with Paul and find help for his resentment issues.
2. Phyllis announces her pregnancy and engagement to Nick to Daniel, who is happy for her despite their strained relationship due to Phyllis's actions at Restless Style.
3. Jill and Genevieve get into a physical altercation at the Athletic Club, causing a scene. Later, Genevieve learns that her husband Colin has been released from prison.
